comment: Amazing staff  and service, specially under the COVID-19 drama, the hotel was kept clean, everyone was very friendly.   The breakfast was always fresh with plenty of options, catering for many different tastes.  Will definitely come back once the World goes back to normal.
author: jocasey2020

comment: Deeply enjoyed my stay here. Facilities were excellent and services was spectacular. Especially a guy named Kevin, he made us all feel very well welcome and was extremely nice to us all. Thankyou!!!!!
author: Max W

comment: One of the best family hotel in Bali. Overall, the hospitality is excellent. Bravo to  all the staffs at Kids Club. When I requested late check out, the hotel told me that my family room will be occupied soon but surprisingly they offered me to move to other room for my late check out. Knowing that the hotel lack of staffs due to the high seasons and crowd, I decided not to take the room and just staying at departure lounge. My kids still can enjoy all of the activities though we have checked out and can take a shower at departure lounge.  The only thing needs to be improved is the quality of the breakfast.  Need a lot of improvement as a five stars hotel.
author: Tjoa Family

comment: That was great experienced. I am and my friends come to have a cup of coffee at the kopi petani in Mulia Resort, when they have a carnival event. There are lots of games like shooters, fishing, mini-golf, cup pongs and hits the can. Just with 50K and you can play 3 kinds of games. 2 guys will guide you when you play the games. They are friendly and helpful guidance named Edmon and Agus. I am so happy to have a cup of coffee with fun games.
author: Jeany Tio

comment: Just came back from having stayed a wonderful week at this hotel, the staff were very welcoming and very friendly and couldn’t do enough for you, Bayu one of the beach trainees stood out as he was very attentive, very polite and courteous and always served us with a big smile, he is a credit to this hotel and we wish him every success in his career. The restaurants served wonderful food, we especially enjoyed the Lotus, and the beach restaurant eating overlooking the sea, the food was amazing. The hotel was spotless and had such a calm ambiance to it, I would definitely stay at this hotel again and recommend it to friends and family.
author: Maria C

comment: We had a wonderful trip to uluwatu temple with Ian from the Melia Bali. Ian organised the car and took us through the temple and ensured we got tickets to observe the Kecak dance, which was beautiful.  The whole experience was amazing thanks to Ian who explained some historical elements and walked us through the temple complex with a very friendly manner.  He also organised a car for us on a seperate trip to the markets.  Highly recomend his services, our family had an amazing trip and we’ll def be back!
author: NeeraS

comment: We spent five days in Malia Bali, in familly, during August 2020 and it was a very nice experience.  All measures regarding the COVID-19 crisis were respected and it is a very nice place to stay during this time. The hotel personnal is very professional. They are doing everything to make your stay as best as possible. The food is a high quality level.  The kidz club was open and the children enjoyed it too much, with experienced people taking care of them and providing different activities.
author: serge-et-marie

comment: The only great experience was the kids club. Ms Acik was welcoming my kids so well and they feel comfortable to play. The house keeping was terrible, we havent received towel for one night, already asked 5 people but none were paying attention till i complained to receptionist the next day. Day 1 i had to stay in the room waiting for the towel. Really bad experience. The room was an old room, smelly and we spent 3 nights but no one make up my room. The location was great, the beach was beautiful.
author: wahyu arifin

comment: I've visited Melia bali twice now and I can't wait to book my next trip. The resort is absolutely beautiful, especially the gardens, pool and beach areas. The staff are extremely friendly, kind and helpful and there is plenty to do if you don't want to leave the resort. The food menus at the restaurants and the pool were pretty reduced compared to when I first stayed pre-covid, but there was still a big enough variety and all the food we had was great. Given the difficulties that the community and tourism industry in Bali faced over Covid, I thought the resort was doing an amazing job at getting back up and running. All the staff were doing their best to ensure all guests had a great time, and I definitely did. Well done to the team at Melia and I look forward to returning as
author: shannan2223

comment: Kevin who works in the gym and the Golf simulator was absolutely amazing. He made us feel very welcomed, comfortable and confident in playing golf and working out in the gym. We constantly booked Golf with Kevin as we had the most amazing time. He is a great and hard working man. Highly recommend.
author: Janelle S

comment: We've stayed in a lot of 5-star hotels in Bali but this one is by far my favorite. We stayed in the Lagoon access room and absolutely loved the modern room and having direct access to the pool is amazing. The gym is also one of the best of any hotel I've stayed at anywhere. Oh, and the staff were super nice.
author: Dan P

comment: Staff were super friendly and always willing to help. I most enjoyed yoga/Pilates and aqua fitness. Agues was the main teacher. We did the afternoon tour to Uluwatu temple with Agues and Soma, they were fantastic tour guides and entertained us with their songs and stories.
author: Esther E

comment: There are plenty of outstanding and true reviews on this resort so I'll say no more.  However my family would like to give a BIG two thumbs up to the staff and management of this lovely resort!! Myself and my two young lads were struck down with sickness at Christmas (no fault of the resort) and it was a miserable time for us however the crew at Melia went out of their way to accommodate and look after us...  Ensuring we had plenty of water, asking after our wellbeing and even making a special brew of chicken soup for us when food was not on our radar.  It broke my heart not being able to enjoy the awesome Christmas buffet lunch which was off the charts and as good as I have seen anywhere in my travels across the planet. Again thanks Melia for your outstanding efforts and
author: David G

comment: Our 3 week stay in LEVEL room was fantastic. Personalised service  - speacial thanks to Yuli - Customer care manager at LEVEL. She found solution for all our special request with no hesitation.  All LEVEL facilities and special service were worth the money and made our stay pleasant and special. It means mainly: served breakfast in Sorento, separated pool and beach facility, separated reception, aftrenoon tea time and evening cocktail. We only would apreciate more stable quality of food served in room service. Fantastic big garden with very pleasant overal atmosphere.
author: edval2019ed

comment: I really enjoy my time during the stay. The staffs are really helpful and friendly. They have amazing staffs (aci n dani) at kids club who always ready to help you with your child and give fun to yours. The facilities they have are good. Definitely will come back to this place again
author: Yovi

comment: This is our favourite hotel in Bali, beautiful tropical gardens, oozes Balinese style and serenity.  Food is delicious and adult only facilities top notch.  But above all, the staff are friendly and give attentive service - every one of them - my gratitude to them all as they all do a wonderful job without exception.  We look forward to seeing you next year.
author: cherylg105

comment: It was a perfect staycation. The hotel got a very nice view of the beach.  It has many facilities for kids such as the kids club, mini pool, mini bike, movie nights, marshmellow by the beach.  My kid and nieces really enjoy the kids club for 2 days in a row, assisted by Ms Dani, Ms Sasih, Ms Dayu, Ms Resi, Ms Tya and Ms Aci. So the parents could do sunbathing or just relaxing by the beach/pool. We really love the beanbag by the beach. Such a stress free holiday. Thank you so much Melia Nusa Dua :)
author: Luh Anjani K

comment: We checked in with low expectation of all the services and facilities due to the low occupancies of resorts in Bali. But Melia has been excellent. Upgraded our room from lagoon access to beachfront villa which is perfect because it is next to the kids club (where my 5yo boy spent the whole stay playing there) Thanks to Tya who has been excellent at the kids club. Breakfast was excellent. All the staff was excellent. Wish you guys all the success. Definitely will come back.
author: fandy s

comment: We recommend strongly at any couple or family who wants to visit Bali, to book a room (better one lever Lagoon) on the Melià Bali Spa Resort, in Nusa Dua. Apart from the great experience on a fantastic Indonesian place, with volcans, temples, beaches and lovely lovely people; on that resort you will also have the best experience in a paradise of gardens, paisages, good food and the best staff and wonderfull treatment. You really will find in heaven. We went for our Honey moon and recommending 100%. 🙏🎑😍
author: Maria V

comment: What a wonderful experience to step into the fabulous gardens of the Melia Bali and start a magnificent holiday. The staff of the Level are amazing as are Darma and Resti serving guests at the pool and the  beach. Sudiatini cleans the resort beautifully. From relaxing by the pool to eating at the restaurants you wont regret staying at the Melia.
author: Christine M

comment: Melia is set right on the beach in Nusa Dua and is a great resort if you don't plan to leave the hotel for the entire stay. The gardens are lush, plenty of free activities available, numerous pools and a spa. There is an adults only pool and beach area but there were children in it the entire time we were there which wasn't ideal. We stayed in a villa with a pool and it was beautiful. There was a nice tropical garden and a dining area for room service. The bed was huge and beautiful, indoor and outdoor showers and a huge bath tub. Due to the pandemic only one restaurant was open and that was the beach club which had nice views and vibe. The food was average and a bit boring, no vegan options except a green salad but it was all cooked pretty well. The beach out front was lovely
author: Irish Wanderer

comment: Stayed here Feb 2020 We have been coming to Melia Nusa Dua for years, the staff are amazing they can't do enough for you. The rooms are clean and nice. Melia is right on the beach and Collections is only a short walk (restaurants and shops). We were disappointed with Breakfast this time, usually there is so much more to chose from but not this time. All Inclusive was nice the menu in all the restaurant's were very limited, usually you have plenty to choose from in all the restaurants. Although there wasn't a great choice the food we had was lovely, maybe the cut backs were because the resort was very quiet, hope the food choice goes back to normal. I can't wait to go back to Melia Nusa Dua, you can't go wrong having an all inclusive holiday here,
author: balloch10

comment: My wife and myself have just returned from Melia Bali celebrating my wife's birthday, our stay at this hotel throughout was fantastic. We had upgraded to the Level and was it worth it, from the minute we arrived until we departed we were pampered and looked after from all the staff, but special mention for Sunnarini, Yudi and Darma, you were all amazing and made our holiday that bit more special. The Hotel Melia was everything we had hoped for, the food, gardens, pool and beaches were immaculately looked after, and the staff were so warm and friendly, would definitely recommend this hotel for a super relaxing holiday.  Thanks to everyone, keep up the good work.
author: TPN

comment: if you do not know Nusa Dua yet, do not leave Bali without having discovered this magnificent place!  During the month spent at the Mélia hotel, I was able to appreciate all the beauty of its gardens and the lagoon, all the comfort of the rooms with direct access to the swimming pool, all the hospitality and kindness of the people who are  invest in it and in particular Ian, with whom I had the pleasure of practicing yoga and pilates almost daily.  A wonderful cocktail to fill up with beautiful energies.  Don't wait any longer!
author: Caro Line

comment: Pros It is a well maintained resort with very cheerful and helpful staff. Our kids loved the double storey family room. Kids activities were fun.   Cons  Room Interior was bit old. Curtains bit torn Room service was bad After 2 nights, we upgraded to Level guests room, and service for level guest was pathethic. We forgot to take the mobile chargers along and we informed staff immediately after checkout, but we didnt get those back ever.  Overall it was a comfortable stay except the inconvenience caused by LEVEL guest service.
author: Akash T

comment: I came to spend a long relaxing weekend with my girls recently. We really had an amazing experince with all the activities from the hotel. We started every morning doing yoga, cycling and aquarobic, enjoy the fabulous breakfast and end the day relaxing with their coctails at the beach. They have very kind instructors to guide us with the sport activities. Our room was always clean and the staffs were very kind and helpful anytime with beautiful smile. Definitely will come again soon, wait for us guys 😍
author: fauziadiana23

comment: Amazing service!  Desak and Gede provided exceptional service at Sorrento restaurant. We were so well looked after. They were friendly and accomodating and really took pride in making us feel welcome. We went back 3 times. The food was equally delicious! Mark and Michelle
author: Michelle H

comment: We were unsure of going to Bali until two days before the trip. The decision to go was the best possible.   We stayed at the Meliá Bali Nusa Dua on the recommendation of friends. Another great decision!  The resort's structure is impeccable. However, what caught our attention even more was the high quality of the services, despite the many challenges imposed by the pandemic.   The maintenance of the facilities was excellent, the quality of the services was amazing, the drinks and foods were always fresh, and the employees' attention and care were admirable.  I also want to register a compliment to Mr. Edouard and to Mr. Hendra on behalf of all the employees who have served us so well. Terrific job!  Although the pandemic is imposing a challenging period on everyone, the way we
author: Tiago

comment: I can not find fault in our experience at Melia Nusa Dua. From the front desk, to the restaurants staff, house keeping and recreation staff, they have all been exceptional, warm, kind, patient, and helpful.  As a quiet family who likes to laze around and stay away from the hustle and bustle, Melia hotel was perfect.  The highlight of our holiday was by far the kids club. Maria, Sasih, Dani, Acy, Tya, Coraeny, Dewi and all the staff in charge of the kids activities and care were amazing. Our children had so much fun and did not want to leave. The activities were thoughtful, educational, fun and kept the children entertained. They have made the best memories there and many little friends.  We also very much enjoyed eating at Sakura. The staff there were also very warm and
author: twji00

comment: There is nothing to do in Nuda Dua for a solo traveler. The hotel charges 300% mark-up for everything including activities. The food sucks and it is definitely not a 5 star. It is an old hotel that needs a serious revamp. No usb port to charge your phone, old TVs. TINY room. I hated my stay here.
author: Zoleka

comment: Amazing hotel. Loved the yoga and pilates with Agus.  His attention to detail and personalised service made our experience at the Melia memorable.  We look forward to our next holiday there.  The staff were very friendly, grounds were immaculate, great location and very quiet.
author: Skye D

comment: The property is superbly located, has control access and seems to be ready even for tsunamis! A very commendable thing, of we think of what vagueness in 2004. So you are in a managed, supervised area. The hotel is also very conveniently located, as regards the airport, the beach (you get immediate access to it), a hospital, a splendid art museum (just next door, the Pasifika Museum) and has easy access to all the points of interest in Bali: Uluwatu Temple or Garuda monument being the most important landmarks in the vicinity. The rooms and its amenities are excellent. There is an option for everyone: luxury, family, etc. My family and I did enjoy very much all the services and the accommodation.  The hotel, while not new, is well kept. The facilities and amenities are excellent.
author: franciscoaK7600CX

comment: great stay with exceptional staff. Food and drinks also great. Easy walking distance to the main town of Nusa Dua where you can get exceptional massages. Beach and pool were great and it was not a problem getting a lounger
author: Maurie D

comment: We got to the hotel greeted by their friendly staff, and it didn't take long at all to get us checked in (a plus). We had the villa, it was so spacious and their attention to detail are remarkable,  they think about what u need and exactly where u need it. We had a pool in the villa and we had the floating breakfast which was really fun and great experience. For you that want some chilax time. I will definitely recommend this hotel. We also did some activities while we were there. The gym was  👌 and we also did archery class. Can't wait to go back!
author: Maya C

comment: We originally only planned to stay for 1 night but ended up coming back and staying for more nights because we were very impressed with the resort. Our daughter spent time in the kids club and loved it, they had great activities and the ladies there were great. We would definitely recommend Melia Bali and it’s kids club for families.
author: Donna K

comment: What a beautiful stay we’ve had at the Melia Bali hotel. Bayu who looked after our every need at the pool and beach was outstanding, nothing was ever too much trouble for him and he made us feel very special. He was easy to talk too and seemed interested in listening to us. He was efficient and polite in the way he dealt with our requests, a valuable member to the pool concierge team at melia Bali. Thank you Bayu for all who helped us with we really appreciate it.
author: lisaperks1970

comment: Overall a disappointing experience staying here.   The resort is missing all the final touches for this to be a 5 star. Would say it is more like a 3 star property.   Prices on food and drink are very high and quality isn’t great.   There is other nicer hotels in Nusa Dua that I would recommend instead.
author: Traveller_1Perth_WA

comment: We have just arrived back from the Melia and had a fantastic week with our family with the all inclusive package. We have two children ages 3 and 6 and they absolutely loved the resort, we felt completely safe and had no worries. Special mention to Bayu from the pool area who looked after us the whole trip, he was fantastic and super attentive to details. The kids will miss him burning their lunchtime pool treats!
author: SimonandSarah

comment: Wonderful holiday will definitely be back. Thank you too the wonderful Anie who looked after us so well. Nothing was too much trouble to assist us. Gede and Perringa who looked after us pool side made sure we always had drinks and food on hand. Thank you for such a beautiful holiday we will be back. Love Julie, Matt and Pauline.
author: Julie B

comment: We had such a lovely time at the Melia Bali in Nusa Dua. The resort is gorgeous, with beautiful gardens, pools & beach. The staff were all friendly & made our time very memorable. Dayu was so great to help us get involved in the activities provided & Agus always made us smile.  We hope to come back soon!
author: Komang Mel

comment: We enjoyed a relaxing few days at Melia Bali.  Enjoyed the swimming pool and the floating pool pillows.  The grounds are beautiful.  Didn't find any of the food exceptional.  Daughter was unwell after eating paella in the Mediterranean restaurant, think the dish had been warmed up which is a no no with rice.  The restaurant was way to cold that most people chose to eat outside.   There was entertainment at the beach restaurant but alas the staff did not have the common sense to ensure chairs faced the direction of the entertainment.  again the food was not great. Still enjoyed our stay, apart from the food.
author: Jools44992

comment: Beutifull place , great staff , very kind people , perfect for relaxing . Tou have so many activities during the day , private beach , private pool , very good food in the restaurants with diferent specifics . I recomand this place and i hope to come back sometime
author: Banyai A

comment: We have been to Bali numerous times, and stayed at Melia Bali twice. Their kids club is the best we have experienced. The staff are wonderful with the children, to the point that they do not want to leave Melia. The staff quickly get to know the children, and make them feel welcome and as part of a big family. The hotel has recently upgraded their kids club facilities, making it even more fun for the children. The movie nights are especially exciting. Our kids often ask about when we go to see Dani, Maria, Sasih and Finda again at Melia, as they just love it there.   Melia offers a great All-Inclusive package, where you also get access to their brand new cafe serving quality coffees.   We can't wait to go back to Melia!
author: Dirk1820738

comment: As a family with 3 little girls, we could not have had a better time. The Melia experience made us feel relaxed and we could not have wished for a better service. The Melia stands in the middle of stunning nature and the facilities are the ones of some of the best hotels we have ever stayed in.  We have started saving money to come back :-)
author: Aurélie P

comment: I live in Bali with my family (including a young child). We chose hotel Melia to celebrate New Years 2022. It's very kid friendly, has great activities, beautiful beach, and nice ambiance. I recognize the hotel was extra busy due to NYE, but unfortunately my stay was plagued with recurring problems that just led to an overall disappointing stay. I paid a lot for my room, and I just expected better.  1. Our 2 rooms weren't ready until past 4pm. We arrived with a cranky child and couln't check in (boooo) 2. We wanted to leave the hotel and another car was double parked in front of our spot. It took the hotel 45+ minutes to resolve this. Where is security? 3. The AC was set to 18 degrees and COULDN'T be changed. We were FREEZING. We called maintenance to come fix it. An hour later,
author: Madeleine R

comment: We recently spent a week at this fantastic hotel and I can not sing it's praises high enough. Our room was spacious and spotlessly clean. The staff were all so friendly and the level of service was fantastic. The grounds of this hotel are spectacular and meticulously kept. There are 5 restraunts to chose from all with their own charm. We ate at the Lotus restaurant 3 times because each night there was a Balinese show on.    The entertainment team were fantastic- we joined in with daily stretching in the pool and Aqua aerobics. I also learned Balinese dancing, took part in the cookery class and craft class. We did not have any children with us but the Kids Club looked fantastic. One night we walked passed and the kids were sitting in little teepees watching a film on a big screen
author: madjane30

comment: We heard that Melia Bali has a holiday program for kids and junior. We decided to explore and take a peek ….😄  Even though, we have our own private villa for our accommodation. We are interesting in the program that offered to us especially for our kids that need their own “me time” during this moment.   Finally… We decided to make a reservation for 2 nights stay, and expecting great experience for our beloved sons.  The Hotel high standards of health protocols for Cov-19 is one of the highlight, it gave us a secured feeling and comforts.  Thank you for great service and warm hospitality showed by Mrs. Dayu from the Melia Bali Entertainment Department, which made us to have this blessed decision to enjoy our stay and  the program offered.   Regards,  Indah
author: Indah W

comment: Absolutely fabulous holiday!!! Kids club staff fantastic!!! Thank you Dani and crew!! All staff always friendly and super welcoming. Special mention of Agus, Yoga, Aris.  Venue absolute zen with every detail thought of. Live music at night. Perfect atmosphere at restaurants. Pool water perfect clarity and temperature. Highly highly highly recommended!!!!!!
author: Rina V

comment: Amazing place full of positive energy with a great wellness program that can be tailored upon ones needs. I had an amazing private yoga session with Ian, followed by sound healing and spa treatment all of which were wonderful and exactly what I needed to set my day on the right track. I highly recommend getting in touch with the instructors there to make the best out of your wellness trip.
author: Della

comment: 1st time my stay at this hotel, tho it's quite an old hotel, but the room and surroundings feels so homey and warm to stay. The staff are also very welcome, helpful, and friendly to guests. breakfast, though it's not so many selections during this pandemic, but taste is quite good, and I do love the outdoor, beach bar location..so soothing, so comfy, and yes..we prefer outdoor location. Only need some minor maintenance in the bathroom. Overall..meet my satisfaction.
author: Leony K

comment: Ms Dayu was very helpful. She accomodate all my kids need and listening what they want. She was asking us what kind of movie we would like for the christmas movie night. Opening the indoor room for my boy who has allergic to ac and dirty air. She was also taking care my daughter and explaining her a lot about balinese pura and its culture in a very attractive and interesting way. Definitely would come back for this kids club  Yes. we came in pandemic time. They really care about how sanitize their things and limited kids quota.  Despite of quite old building, and “not really prepared” staaff for the room hotel (i change my room because my bath tub dis not work properly, i can t shower on my first day here) , i would definitely come back for the kids club and its activities
author: Inez C

comment: It is very pleasant for us to stay here. all staff very friendly and helpful. Many choices of activities that can be done such as kayaking, marshmallow time, movie night and various fun and educational activities from the kids club. The beach is so beautiful and the garden is very spacious and wonderful. Special thanks to Miss Tya & Miss Achi from the kids club for taking care the children playing & learning in the kidsclub very well.  Our room has direct access to the pool - love it - We will come back again to Melia Bali in the future.
author: Effendy

comment: Me, my husband and son stayed in Melia Bali. And May I say it was fantastic. After long time of pandemic, we finally could leave work and school behind and fly to Bali to our favorite hotel Melia Bali Nusa Dua. The main beauty of the resort are the staff. The staff at the lounge Ari, Yudi, Ayu, Doni, Gung Gek  are amazing. Ever so friendly and always met us with warm smile. My husband had a medical situation in Bali, and since the staff learnt about it they were all very attentive and helpful. Exceptional service from lounge staff made our stay comfortable and happy at Melia Bali Nusa Dua. We can’t wait to come back and stay at the level again. I can say staff of the resort is the main beauty. You feel the care and passion in all they do. Thank you for taking care of my family.
author: elena a

comment: Really enjoyed our time here… all staffs are amazing to us!!! Pak Alep was very accommodating and offering different activities for our family. We’re so glad that we chose Melia. We stayed 4 nights here but our kids would like to stay for more. We might be back soon! Thank you Melia for making our stay a memorable one 💜💜💜
author: Charlotte Elisafan

comment: We recently stayed at Melia Bali and it was such a beautiful resort. Very peaceful, very spacious so although their occupancy rate was high, it didn't feel like there were heaps of people around. The food is delicious and the grounds are beautifully kept - all the staff are so lovely and also greet you.
author: Nicola T

comment: The service was amazing, with recommendations from the staff (Paitri) in particular with very helpful and full of insight into the menu and flavours,  everyone couldn't do enough for us and made our evening in the restaurant very special. Highly recommended.   Will be returning for another meal soon.   Thank you.
author: Marc R

comment: This is my first time staying in Melia Nusa Dua and it was entertaining!  The room very homie, the bathroom  is very clean, and the lagoon pool got warm water and clean too.. The water activities was fun too! Trying paddle board for the first time and it was exciting!  I do love their kids activities especially when you stay in Friday, Saturday they got Carnival which your kids i guarantee will be having so much fun! Marshmallow bonfire and movie night too! While kiddos do their activities we can enjoy the sunset or relaxing in the cabana facing the beach or just chills at the bar. This is what i called family hotel!
author: Welly T

comment: The service at Elpatio is excellent, definitely will come back. Today we been served by Jeni she was fantastic in her service and they way she presented herself. We loved the environments, food, activities and the respect of all those who served us .
author: Samya H

comment: Facility is amazing, right on the beach which is super clean. The accomodation is very nice and well appointed, with different swimming areas. We loved the breakfast alacarte selections, the coffee, croissants and Spanish eggs delicious.We have two young kids so the Kids Club and the staff at the Kids Club were amazing, a real highlight for us (and our kids). Very attentive and lovely staff. The activities during the day were great, and the night time marshmallow roasting and outdoor movie theatre a real winner. Fantastic value for money. We will be back.  Ps: they have been great in terms of care with corona precautions and controls
author: Adriana

comment: We had a great 1 week stay at Melia. The grounds are beautiful and we enjoyed the daily activities including the bike tour, yoga, Pilates, water stretching and water aerobics and my teenage boys really enjoyed the pool volleyball, waterpolo and basketball. Agus and Alep were both fantastic providing great instruction and fun and were very generous with their time. The gym is very well set up and the departure lounge makes the planning for a late flight much easier The only negative was that we did not have the all inclusive package and other restaurants were a little out of the way.
author: Megsapix

comment: Stayed 1 night only since we are living for a few months in Bali and mostly spend a night here and there. The best way to experience many different hotels and resorts of Bali. From Junior Suite upgraded to Junior Suite Lagoon Access was indeed very generous. Melia Bali is an old property but still one of choices in ITDC that is 5* worth. The room is very modern though, the bed in Junior suite is one of the best bed I have ever slept on. Breakfast at Sorento was great, all breakfast items has good quality, except the black coffee and latte tasted very mild (love strong ones).
author: Jonsen Sinaga

comment: Melia Bali exceeded our expectations. Beautiful setting, excellent food, friendly, helpful staff and lots to do. Having access to the basketball, tennis and padel courts meant our boys were always occupied when they weren't in the pool. The Level and all-inclusive are well worth it if you are planning to spend most or all of your time at the hotel. A special thanks to the waiting staff at the Patio restaurant, the concierge at The Level and Agung Abram, Chief of Security who went above and beyond to find our lost property!
author: GonkOnAStick

comment: The family room, pool, facilities and the YHI spa were fantastic but the best thing was the service from the amazing staff.   We were lucky enough to be served by  Artawinguna (Arta ) on both visits to the Melia 92019 and 2022) and he made our holiday with his kind and attentive service. Also special mention to Juli, Prisanth, Oka  who made the level family beach experience something truly wonderful.
author: Shannon

comment: This is my another stay in Melia.  As my stay this time for only 2 nights, so I decided to choose "garden view room" the old rooms I used to stay many many year ago,  this time I do not want to spend too much in hotel cost because I will have long stay around Bali.  I got what I have paid for,  small old room, small bed and old low ceiling bathroom with small bathtub. However, the room is well sanitized and very clean.   My important note is for shower handle, it does not fit with the bracket,  so that heavy shower handle can easly fell off from the bracket, I was hit  my shoulder, it was so dangerous, luckyly it did not hit my head which can possibly happened because the shower chamber  is so narrow and low.  Other than that, all good.  My favorite place is beach bar, the nice
author: Melly S

comment: My husband and I spent many beautiful days in Bali at the Melia Hotel. Since we used Level services, Mr. Yudi and his team took care of our satisfaction perfectly all the time. During our stay, we were treated in all the restaurants, in which we were satisfied under the management of F&B Dewa. Dayu S and Rini served us in Sorento. We especially want to thank the service staff at Levl beach without exception. Ladka
author: Ladislava V

comment: The melia is nice hotel, the rooms are clean and comfortable, beds very big. family room had two levels. Breakfast was good, there was a lot of food for asians , not so much european or american choices. pool is bad, all the pool is for children. you have to pay for a water ( only 1 small bottle for person is included in price ) that’s the first hotel in Bali ( we stayed in 5 hotels) which was charging for water. But most importantly that hotel has very little of real Bali charm.
author: maklere

comment: Even though I came to Mèlia in pandemic condition but I enjoyed my staycation at Mèlia. Beside had a strict protocol, Mèlia provided some activities to do,   such as live music performance, bicycle, painting, etc. The staffs also were very warm and helpful, specially Mas Aris. He served us in the restaurant and helped us to choose the best menu that Mèlia had. He was the reason I extended 1 more night at Mèlia 😍. One last unforgettable moment, I found squirrel and some kinds of bird. Surprisingly, all of them were so tame!
author: Tya

comment: We got married here 20 years ago and returned to celebrate our Anniversary, it was simply amazing, the grounds much the same if even more beautiful, the lobby checkin area is something to behold, the sateria (bar and restaurant area) now developed into a much larger area to sit and eat and the bar a perfect chill out area to watch the sunset. I could literally walk the grounds all day it's so enchanting with its pure traditional balinese enbience. Staff are wonderful and fall over themselves to look after you. Our Anniversary meal was beyond our expectations having Wahgu (not sure of the correct spelling sorry) wait on us he was fantastic. So many memories here from so long ago and a return did not disappoint, thank you for a wonderful return visit.
author: Lben16

comment: Melia Hotel always satisfying as usual. Huge room, clean, helpful staf, care with our needs as more pillow and towel, and many things is deserve for two thumbs up. The very pleasant thing is all staff always greet us wherever we meet them. Love it
author: liannasetiawan

comment: We loved this resort. It was just a relaxing and peaceful property.  We purchased the all inclusive food/drink package and it was well worth it.  The food here was absolutely amazing!  As a Level guess we really enjoyed the quiet pool and the food/drink service. Our room was beautiful and clean. The staff was so very friendly and accommodating.  We look forward to a return trip soon!!
author: Resort180232

comment: The best hotel resort in Bali for family, lovers, couple, single. You will enjoy everything there, breakfast, launch, dinner, bar, swimming pools, Spa, yoga time with a wonderful teacher, the beach and so... I spent around one month in a like paradise. The staff are incredibly so nice and lovely. The design and decoration are very well done. You can't stop making pictures. Everything is thinking to make you feel home and very welcomed. I definitely will be back.
author: Dean ILDEFONSE

comment: My wife and I stayed at the Melia for 7 nights all inclusive. It is a beautiful place and in a great location. The staff are so friendly and all the staff at the level pool need to be commended for their service. Yudi and Resti really looked after us during our stay.  Will define key return.
author: Lee B

comment: We enjoyed a villa during our honeymoon in Melia Bali. It has been an awesome experience. The villa had a private pool, large garden area, different chill-out lounges and a very spacious bedroom. The service is awesome and the staff is more than friendly and professional.
author: Martin T

comment: Have just returned home from a week long stay at Melia with my brother. We had a fantastic stay and our garden view room was kept perfectly by the team with special mention to Elly who was super helpful during our stay. This is a great resort for families or couples with stunning natural grounds and right on the beach. Would rerun for sure.
author: YourSydneyGuidecomau

comment: It was our second time here and it was still as great as usual. The grounds and public spaces are kept immaculate and clean. Food was superb, cooked fresh  Staff are always friendly, helpful and courteous and housekeeping do a great job We see you all next year
author: jack D

comment: My family and I visited Melia Bali in the first week of August, 2020, right after Indonesian Government lifted the restrictions for domestic travels. It was the best surprise ever! The hotel has kept its high standards of operation even with very few guests. The hotel is clean, alive, colorful! Live music every night, great food menu, with many options for vegetarians. We have 2 little ones and they have an amazing kids club and marshmallow bonfire every afternoon, with movie session for the children on the weeked. I was amazed by their reception, friendly behaviour. They have all the best practices on social distance, cleaning, masks and face shield. Alcohol gel everywhere. I felt safe and welcomed. A special thanks to Eduardo Perera, the manager, and Elena, the quality
author: Ana Carolina Abreu

comment: Just returned from 9 nights at this resort. Everything was great with lovely people and great service. Nothing was too much trouble the staff can not do enough to help all very respectful. In particular I want to say a huge thank you to Rika Nurjaya the greeter and booker at Sorrento Restaurant. She found us a table on the first night when we hadnt booked and throughout our stay was positively charming helpful and friendly. An absolute gem. Thank you Rika - we will stay in touch
author: bspragg

comment: We spend 10 days in Melia Bali, the weather  not very good due to Rainy season, but Staff was amazing, Full of activities and Entertainment, and Full of small Details that make our Holidays Special and memorable. Special mención to Ian from Animation Team, Doni, Arta, Mitha, el pequeño saltamontes, Lagu,  Paitri in Level, Brigita, Nang Sakura Restsurant amazing Show. And everyone, sorry we can not remember all the names.
author: Fortunata S

comment: We stayed at the resort in October and it was just fabulous.My husband and I livedin Vietnam in recent times for 6 years, and therefore have travelled Asia extensively and this resort is better than any in HoiAn, Hanoi, Laos etc etc just wonderful. Only today I have contacted the Melia because of a sad family situation and they been absolutely wonderful in their understanding of the situation and it has been resolved to my families satisfaction.  Thanks you Melia staff for your ongoing kindness and thoughtfulness, at this dark time it has been a light at the end of the tunnel.
author: KBWood

comment: My wife and I came here for part of our honeymoon. The staff is amazing. They go out of their way to welcome you and get you whatever you need. The pool/beach staff Sari, Darma, Adi and  Resti were amazing. Elena who is the quality manager was also wonderful when I mentioned some problems we were having. Definitely worth it to do the level and all inclusive. The food is very expensive here compared to the rest of Bali so it pays off. The grounds are amazing but the buildings are a little outdated. Also they definitely need new tennis balls and new tennis rackets😳Would stay here again! We had a very relaxing and beautiful time here
author: Jessica S

comment: We did the all inclusive option - highly recommend   Kids club is the best in Bali, close to pool/beach/bar so you can relax and your kids are not far away. Ours preferred being there most days!  Grounds are gorgeous with classic Balinese architecture and design. Clean and great food, good choices of restaurants.
author: Casey Lucas

comment: My husband and I just returned from five days staying at the Melia we had a lagoon room with all inclusive drinks and food through Luxury Escapes. It was a wonderful time. We enjoyed all of the hotel facilities the yoga and pilates by Ian were particularly good. We loved the fresh juice bar and the coffee bar. We ate in four of the restaurants ,all really delicious. I had an opportunity to look at the pool villa and have rebooked again to go in the next 12 months as I enjoyed it so much. The staff were amazing all very helpful. Just a really relaxing environment. Staying in the level also enhanced our stay as we had a large private adult pool. Thank you can’t wait to go back. Definitely recommend
author: Sally J

comment: Every morning the breakfast was good and service was really respectful. There was this one Amazing waiter called Sudana, who was extremely nice to us, always had conversations with us and made us always feel welcomed. He even remembered our names!
author: Louis

comment: Everything about this hotel is 5 star. Except the staff who are 6 star! Some of them recognised me from my stay in July months earlier showed they really take genuine interest in guests. Made me feel pretty special. I can't wait to return!
author: sean M

comment: This hotel is very family friendly. Lots of activites for family vacation. The beach is beautiful and enjoyful because there isn't many people like other public beaches throughout Bali. The staffs are very friendly and helping. We'll definitely come back
author: silvia m

comment: My partner and I stayed at the Melia Bali for 9 nights, and we had the most wonderful holiday. All of the staff were so friendly and accomodating, we particularly want to give a shout out to Agus who worked around the pool, and David from El Patio. Also a special shoutout to the great bar-tender (sorry, I forgot your name) who made dirty martini's upon request.  We're already dreaming of being back. Thank you so much!  Sophia & Jordon
author: Jordon E

comment: Been here for 8 days and Melia Bali overall is one of the best resorts we’ve been to. The staff are fantastic, particularly Putu and the pool and bar staff. Balinese people are always friendly and eager to please and are Bali’s No.1 asset as are Melia’s staff.  The Melia Bali staff are so friendly and genuinely engage in conversation and nothing is a problem. The facilities are very good and Nusa Dua is great and way better than Kuta and Legian. Highly recommend Melia Bali, we’ll be back.
author: Blithe R

comment: It was a dream holiday, every detail of this resort was carefully seen to and guests accommodated in any and every way possible. The staff were lovely, especially Ian who ran some of the activity classes like yoga and Batik painting. Highly recommend this place for a luxury Balinese getaway. The YHS spa was incredible as well, highly recommend a massage here.
author: Audreyg

comment: we stay at junior suite room with access to pool. it was awesome, kids was so happy, they can swin anytime they want. room are big and clean exactly same with the picture. 4 bottle equile per day as complimentary. tasty food, great spa, private beach, and kids club with a lot activity. and the restaurant too.. their carbonara and margaritha pizza the best.. thats why we reschedule our flight and stay one more night..
author: Navigate827387

comment: This hotel was amazing, the level of service was out of this world with every staff member always so happy and wanting to help. The gardens was a credit to the gardeners as nothing was out of place. Great hotel highly recommend to anyone and we will be back soon.
author: welshie67

comment: This resort really gets it right! Beautiful location and nicely appointed rooms. Many many options for room categories and views. Food is great everywhere and cleanliness is assured throughout entire resort! All these wonderful comments are only surpassed by the friendly, earnest and efficient staff! At every interaction we felt our question or concern was of top priority! Of special thank you to is Dewa Ayu, who has been our welcome host, advocate, and all around extremely sincere and pleasant person to work with.  Nusa Dua area is not the least expensive place to stay in Bali but definitely the most beautiful that we have experienced so far. Melia offers a great value for top notch location and accommodations
author: Janet B

comment: This hotel is perfect for family, there are tons of children activities here that will make your kids happy. I see children running around all day jumping from pool to carnival to bicycling to watching movies with popcorn and ice cream. Watching them is just so much fun! Don't worry about the parents as they have bar, coffee stall, shisha spot, sparkle bar, cabanas, dj, and live music. So the adults are well entertained too. Happy kids, happy parents are truly found here I guess? The staffs were so friendly too, it feels like I'm not in a resort but in a Mini Disneyland? Hahah loving my time here so much.
author: Ken Sugijanto

comment: Stayed all inclusive for 5 nights. Has every thing you need for a lazy beach holiday. The grounds were immaculate, pool was lovely. Staff were really friendly and spoke very good English. Jaya makes the best cocktails and has a knack of making everyone feel special.
author: Sarah S

comment: Old 5 stars hotel in Nusadua Bali . That try to maintain their standard , but some area needs improvement, Like breakfast was to crowded and food variants so boring and standard . Waiting bellboy for check out 1 hour. But extraordinary Kidsclub employee  miss Dani, Sasih, Tya , Resi, Graney , Dayu and Achi  they take care kids from 9AM till 8 PM . With so many interesting activities. And an special thanks yo Bu Kadek at restaurant, who calming  my tantrum kids. What a wonderful. She ask permit to take care my daughter while my daughter was crying, and not 10 minutes, voilà .. they come back and mu daughter already calm and smile
author: Patricia Ditha

comment: The room, breakfast, and customer service were all great, but the highlight for me was their fitness and wellness offerings. Ian was amazing - he worked with me over the course of my stay to develop a fitness routine that I could take back with me to the U.S. As a personal trainer he is a good listener, thoughtful, and challenges you to meet your goals. I left Melia Bali feeling refreshed and strong. Thank you Ian!
author: Yaser A

comment: We stayed in this hotel for Christmas and I have to say it was the best decision we made. From the warm welcome of all the staff we crossed by when we arrived until we left everything went above our expectations. The Level team took care of every detail in our stay, the room was beautiful and comfy, the food was that good that we did all our meals there, breakfast even with Covid restrictions had a lot of variety and the Christmas dinner was just espectacular. Definitely we will be back to this hotel in our next visit to Bali!
author: MarieC

comment: The best staycation that we ever had in Melia Bali. The  hotel had very good service with excellent hospitality. We really enjoyed all the activities that the hotel provide for the guests, especially the kids and teenager activities both indoor and outdoor. The staffs were very kind, caring and helpful toward all my children. They took care of the children very well during all the activities. Thank you to Miss Acik, Miss Dani, Miss Sasih, Miss Tya, Miss Resi, Miss Dayu, Mr Alep and Mr. Edmund. The hotel also had delicious breakfast with great food varieties. We hope that we can come back here soon. Thank you Melia Bali for this great holiday.  Love from us, Claudia - Emmeline
author: Daudlesmana

comment: Although we have stayed at the Meliá Bali many times, we were a little apprehensive post COVID as we knew Bali as a whole was doing it very hard.  We were delighted that the hotel and grounds were immaculately maintained.  The staff, many of them new, were great.  The Meliá management has done a fantastic job in keeping the long time staff part-time doing maintenance etc. during COVID.
author: Lois W

comment: Nusa Dua, what a wonderful place to rest and take time by the ocean.  I discovered there, the Melia, a flower of paradise, to my greatest happiness.  The hotel is magnificent with its shimmering vegetation of colors and greens so vibrant, its ponds, its statues, its beach, its swimming pools ... All this in addition to the welcome and the bright smiles of a benevolent team.  What joy and what beautiful energies to practice morning yoga facing the Ocean at Nusa Gede, Waterblow or in the Spa garden with Ian, the yoga teacher.  When we come there, we just want to stay or come back.  The best is to try!
author: Caro Line

comment: Pool Concierge   Just got back from a fantastic stay in Melia Bali. The hotel was great with very mature gardens right on the beach. We had access to the Level pool which was geared up for older guests. There is a team of pool concierge guys that look after you whilst your chilling round the pool. I’d like to thank the pool concierge guys for making an amazing holiday. Thanks to Pringa, Darma, July, Arya and Arya you guys made the holiday special!!
author: Dan M

comment: We stayed there for 2 nights and it was great, the room is spacious and for family of 4 it could accomodate everyone comfortably. The staff are very friendly and helpful, the health protocols are strictly implemented. All the activities inside the hotel are fun, so that we dont have to go anywhere.
author: Aggy R

comment: The resort is beautiful and the service was top notch. We planned on staying here only one night after a two week travel around the rest of Bali. It was the perfect way to end an exhausting adventurous trip to finally be able to truly relax. The resort has everything you need and there is a very nice shopping mall with stores and restaurants within walking distance as well. We ended up staying a few nights longer because we just weren't ready to leave! I don't know if the upgrade to the level at all Melias is necessary, but it definitely makes a difference here. The service with the level and access to the private lagoon right outside your door is fantastic. You are lucky if you have the privilege of meeting and working with Yudi! He took excellent care of us and is a genuinely
author: Jessie D

comment: Great resort for families, catering for kids and adults.  We took our son snorkeling with Manta Ray, quad biking, but his favourite part of the holiday was kids club.  Thank you to the kids club team Dani, Sasih, Dayu
author: Andrew B

comment: We come to Melia Bali on the weekend because it has special daypass' offer on social media. At first, we thought, this hotel will be the same as other places in Nusa Dua. Luckily, it was totally wrong.  Here is really different. They offer activity which is out of our expectation. We enjoyed every activities and one day is not enough for us. Lucky, we met Ms Dayu from entertainment on the way to go to Cabana. Ms Dayu welcomed us warmly and explained the facilities and activities in detail. We enjoy canoeing,thank you to Bp Sunata and Alep.  kids club' staff very friendly thank you Ibu sasih, Resi, Tya.  Pantomime so fun with Bp. Irul (magician) and Ian master of balloon.  We promised to come back to Melia Bali with our big family  because we are really satisfied and we hope we
author: tari b

comment: My time at Melia was better than expected in all areas, the service was amazing the activities such as futsal, volley ball, h20 basketball, h20 volleyball, h20 soccer and many more sports in and out of the water, so there is always something to do. The activities are run by ian, alep, gunk and made, who make the activities 10 times more enjoyable. Thanks for the awesome holiday. Would recommend
author: Oliver TP

comment: We stayed at the Melia Nusa Dua in November. We have been visiting Bali for over 20 years and normally stay in smaller size hotels. Although it is a large hotel we had a wonderful stay. We had a level lagoon access room which was fantastic, especially for our two young children. The staff through the entire hotel were incredible, so friendly and professional. We would  like to especially thank the staff in the kids club. They were all amazing, Our two girls had a ball in the kids club everyday. We had never visited a kids club before, it was fantastic! A big shout out especially to Presi and Finda, who were incredible with our girls (age 4 and 6 years). So friendly, so fun and professional, we simply adored them! We have already booked to come back next year.
author: Lissyhoop

comment: Thank you so much Melia Bali for making our stay unforgettable with your kindness and joy, especially thanks to Doni and Dika at the Level, the entire staff of the Sorrento restaurant, the lovely housekeeping, as well as Mahendra, Sinta and Yuni at the Lotus restaurant. Our entire experience and the Level amenities were world-class. We look forward to coming back to you again soon!
author: Embrita

comment: The staff were the most friendly staff i’ve ever met.  kevin who is the gym guy was very friendly, we talked about football and life which made me like the hotel more. All the gym staff were very friendly also the restaurant staff. I loved the trip and if I ever come back to indonesia i’ll make sure i go to melia bali
author: Alperen E

comment: We spent 5 days at the hotel. The hotel is great, very clean, gardens, pool, rooms and beach. The staff is amazing, always with a sincere smile and willing to help. At the reception desk Adipayana went above and beyond his responsibilities during our check-in when we had an issue with our reservation, nothing to do with the hotel at all. Food in the restaurants was very good with the exception of the restaurant at the beach, very slow and food was not good but we ended going to the other restaurants and food was excellent there. Fully recommend it.
author: avvtor

comment: I went for a workout in the hotel gym and was offered a free training session with Ian. It was good, intense boxing training with pads. Ian provided a brilliant session that not only worked me physically, but also worked on the skills of boxing as well. If you want to have a good workout during your stay, Ian is the man to go to.
author: Conor M

comment: We spent the last 12 nights here and had the most amazing experience.  We paid for the The Level which was the best decision and included nearly everything including food and drinks.  The staff are the most wonderful people and so helpful.  We would like to say a very special and big thank you to Darma at The Level swimming pool.  Every day you gave us the most fantastic service and always had a smile.  Darma you are an absolute credit to Melia, the resort is so lucky to have you!  Thank you Melia for the best holiday ever, more than we could if wished for....we will definitely be back!!
author: Dave B

comment: Staying for 4 nights and the kids love it so much. Lots of activities that the kids can enjoy at Melia such as marshmallow party, movie night for the kids, riding bike and even rent gokart. The hotel also have really strict covid protocol rules. Most of the staff was okay but there were 1 staff that me and the kids falling in love so hard! Thank you miss Dani from the kids club, the kids was crazy in love with you lol. Hope to visit again soon and best of luck for you. ❤️
author: Angela L

comment: I think the most favorite thing we like about our stay in Melia is the unlimited use of kids club and kids/family activities. My 3 kids love it so much. Thank you to the friendly and warm kids club staffs: Tya, Aci, Sasih, Geaneg, Resi and Dayu!!
author: shinegal

comment: i really enjoyed my stay at Melia Bali. The hospitality offered by the staffs are super friendly and the really are offering the best service. The food was so good and the hotel room is amazing. The hotel offers variety of activities, shoutout to the guest relations team! especially to all the team working by the pool!
author: devina faustanisa

comment: We booked a couples retreat away for my wife and myself, our holiday conditions were that we could stay some where and turn off our social media be pampered and have activities/expiriances close to our door step. Melia was perfect and we will deffinatly be coming back in the future. Thanks again!!  James
author: James D

comment: Where do I even start… this hotel is absolutely stunning and beautiful. The customer service is the top I have ever seen and this is coming from us who love to travel and have been to another resorts. When booking we decided to get the garden villa, on the arrival we were speechless, it was AMAZING!  We were extremely happy about the food, oh dear!  The staff were super nice, always with a smile and a beautiful energy. Yuli and Doni we loved you so much :D
author: Natalia M

comment: We really enjoyed Melia Nusa Dua with our 18 month old and her grandparents. The grounds were beautiful, the beach front very good and the staff all super friendly. Lots of choice when eating also with the various restaurants. We had the all inclusive package and couldnt recommend this more highly. We'll be back.
author: ZachR

comment: Great stay. A lot of activities for our kids, bike, carnaval, pop corn, canoe, etc. Kids club very clean and well maintained with many activities planned.  Room clean and in good condition. Bathroom needs some updates. We stayed at the Family Duplex.  Yhi spa is clean and we had a great massage there.   Staffs are very friendly and helpful especially Ibu Dayu and team (Irul, Agus, Alep, Ian) from the entertainment area.  Will definitely come back when we are in Bali again.
author: Sue Suhendro

comment: Top notch service and hospitality. From the very first step inside the lobby till out last step to the parking lot, we were overwhelmed by the warmth and kindness.  We visited during weekday and not many guests but the services were still excellent.  We took our 3 year old boy there and the kids club were top notch. Ms. Acik, Sasih, Tya, Resi and Dani were like our families.   Kid's Activities were numerous, and we did a temple tour there. We were the only guest and our boy took pictures with balinese costumes. A really nice experience during our visit.  Keep up the good work Melia Bali !
author: Frostburne

comment: Myself and husband stayed in Melia Bali on our honeymoon. We had a fantastic stay in the Levels accommodation. The staff were absolutely fantastic throughout the entire hotel, every single staff member would greet you. Special mention goes to Darma, Arta and Pringga at the pool, nothing was ever too much for them. We had an amazing honeymoon in Bali and we cannot wait to return to paradise. Thank you!!
author: Terri

comment: 우리가족은 멜리아에서 All-Includive Package를 선택하여 6일간 머물렀습니다. 이 패키지의 장점은 매일매일 별도의 지출없이 음료와 식사를 즐길 수 있다는 점입니다. 매우 참심한 상품이었습니다. 특히,스탭중 한분인 유디씨는 그 패키지에 포함된 내용을 상세히 설명해 주어서 우리가 이 상품을 이용하는데 불편이 없도록 도와 주었습니다. 매 저녁식사 때마나 5개의 식당 중 우리가 원하는 식당을 예약해 주었으며, 로터스 식당에서는 공연관람을 위한 특별한 좌석까지 예약해 주었습니다. 마지막날 체크아웃이후, 점심과 저녁까지도 호텔에서 식사할 수 있도록 도와주었으며, 출발전까지 대기해야 하는 시원한 로비로 안내해 주었습니다. 이번 여행에서 가장인상 깊은 것은 유디씨 처럼 그곳 스탭들이 매우 친절하였다는 것입니다. 유디씨에게 고마움을 표하고 싶으며 다시한번 만날 수 있는 기회가 있었으면 좋겠습니다. My family spent 6 nights on on an all inclusive package at the Melia Bali.  We ate and drank all day every day, with no worries of extra payment at the end, it was very cool...  In particular, Mr. Yudi provided details of what was included in the package so that we are easy to use it. Every evening he helped us book our dinner all the
author: Sung Jeong

comment: Special thanks to the Kids Club staffs : Miss Dani, Aci, Resi, Tya, Sasih, Ale, Dayu & Ian, who really entertained my son during our stay. He couldnt stop asking when we will be back again to Melia! The kids program are excellent, can accomodate traditional & modern. Also the fun marshmallow sunset session by the beach to be continued with the movie night and free popcorn! My son could spend a day at the kids club without asking where's mama 😅. Definitely will go back! Thanks Melia
author: Suzan L

comment: Very nice beach, comfortable villas, friendly staff and good hygiene. It is located on the shore line and one can take walks on the beautiful Nusa Dua beach. Highly recommended  for families with children as well.
author: Osman Hakan Cepken

comment: It was a lovely day for my kids to be here in Melia. We had so much fun playing at the kids club and really enjoyed the food and the service especially from Dayu, Dani, Tya, Resi, Alep, Irsyad, Sasih & Aci. Definitely will come back again. Good job Melia!
author: Dimas A

comment: It's all good and special thanks to mr Tude great service and great personality very helpfull. The mahi mahi is very delicious also the ice cream scoop. Nice beachside vibe and the beach is very beautiful
author: Fluffy3763

comment: Our friends recommends Melia day pass, and we ended going there twice every weekend. The cabana is so worth it. Both adult and kid can spend the whole day in Melia. The fnb is great, generous portion and the staffs are all helpful and kind. Special shout out for the assistants in kids club, ms Sasih, Aci, Dani  Tya, Resi and also Miss Dayu. They are all kind and very caring towards the childrens. The kids insists to say farewell to the assistants before they left Melia.
author: Kya2

comment: Visited Melia Bali when They held a Halloween Party. The most I love was They are very kids friendly. Everything was amazing, the staff at Sateria and The Kids club took care Us very much, the food and the facilities was great (You guys should try their Bolognaise Pasta from The Kids Menu, best!)  The event was marvellous. We really enjoyed Our Family Time to have lunch at Sateria, and Kids Activity at the Kids Club, The Kids Club also amazing, comfort and clean.  Definitely love to come back soon!
author: Rizky R

comment: The hotel is absolutely fantastic. The rooms are spacious and very clean, the bed is very comfortable. Customer service was excellent, special mention to Aris (from restaurant next to the beach) who made our engagement very special and Boyo (from breakfast) who served us breakfast before the opening time due to our early departure (sorry if the names are wrong). Definitely recommend it and will stay again if we go to Bali.
author: juliannsaez

comment: Great time. Wondefull 2 weeks here. Amazing hotel , amazing food and spectaular service. But here what counts are the people. Always smiling , helping , providing great service.a very good example of such Person is Mr. SAUSTIKA. Always walking around the hotel  , talking with people if they are ok , or need something.asking what melia could improve..just great..many.thanks for the whole Melia crew..wonderfull time here.:-)))
author: Andrzej K

comment: We loved our stay at Melia Bali for our honeymoon. We choose the level experience and it was definitely worth it. Our room was beautiful with lagoon access and a welcome cake for our honeymoon. The breakfast was delicious and all the staff were so friendly. We had dinner in the resort restaurants most nights and food was delicious. The beach access and swimming pools were well maintained. Could not fault any of our stay.
author: aineboyhan

comment: Melia Bali We loved our Melia Bali morning AquaFit and Pilates sessions.   Putu Agus was a SUPERSTAR every day and had is and all the guests having so much fun. Smiles and fun  everywhere. Highly recommend Melia Bali.
author: Christian S

comment: Wonderful Melia, surpassed expectations. All good, very nice location on the beach, nice activities like water zoomba for adults and kids. Nusa dua area itself is very peaceful and ideal for families. The room was clean and spacious. The staff were all exceptional. The only point which needs improvement is the food , which had very few options, but I feel it was due to pandemic.
author: nessneha n

comment: Amazing Resort with the best restaurant in Nusa Dua. Chef Bayu and Chef Wayan Suarvata cook the best Mediterranean food in Nusa Dua. The resort is fsmoly friendly with a nice calm beach. Staff is very helpful and the service is outstanding. A perfect place for a vacation with kids. A lot of activities for kids and adults alike. Highly recommend! Alex, Olia & Dani
author: Alexey M

comment: We had a blast here. The pool/kids area/beach/rooms/spa  were all amazing. The staff is incredibly warm and welcoming. We came with a toddler, a baby, and my husband’s parents. We especially enjoyed water aerobics with Agus every morning. Seems like a great place for older kids too, the gals working in the kids’ club are so sweet. The menu is not huge or the cheapest you can find in Bali. But if convenience is more of a concern (I.e., traveling with toddler and baby) you can’t ask for anything better. This was our second time and we would definitely come back.
author: Abigail

comment: We have stayed here many times. It's like a second home to us. We absolutely love this place and the people who work here. The hotel is in a great location, the beach is beautiful and the local bars and restaurants are a short walk away. We love the villas and the Level Lounge. However, it is the people who work here that make this hotel so special. They really do make our stay here feel like we are in paradise. We have missed you this year and look forward to seeing you all again in 2021.
author: Chris & Karen

comment: We would like to thank the management of Melia Bali for constantly making our holiday  an unforgettable experience! There were new activities for the children, a wonderful renovated children’s center.  After enjoying the food we also many to stay fit with the Cardio classes with the professional guidance of Coach Ali. We also thank the whole radiant and warm-hearted staff who confirmed our conception of Balinese hospitality!
author: Kristina A

comment: Kids friendly hotel. The staff was wonderful. The hotel is well maintained. The environment was pleasant and welcoming. Both check-in and check-out were professionally handled and easy.... Spent 7 nights for NY holiday with my 2 yo baby, definately will come back
author: Nadspolks

comment: My family had the most amazing time at Melia Bali. The moment you arrive, you are greeted with an announcement “welcome to Melia Bali” with a traditional dance. What makes place amazing is the exceptional staff, every single person is to be commended on the service provided to the guests. I have been to many luxury resorts but this one is one of my favorite place now! We got the deal all inclusive which was the best decision we made. The selection of the restaurants is amazing and the standard food is of high standard. The activities during the day are so good! Especially the aquatic exercises in the pool everyday in the morning. The grounds are beautiful and well maintained. I truly recommend this place and can not wait to come back again.
author: Danielle B

comment: Great facilities and awesome staff. Big thanks to all the activities staff including Adrian, Alep, Ian, Gunk, and Made. They were super enthusiastic and did a great job of getting people poolside involved in activities and games.
author: Joshua

comment: This is a great hotel, which is on a gorgeous beach. There are some great swimming pools and plenty of activities throughout the day. We really loved  Kids club and Movie time,  the staff are so friendly. Everyone is always smiling and very happy to help the guests. Thanks for Ms. Dayu Ms Resi and Ms Graney who gave us marhsmellow on the beach, I would definitely recommend...
author: Fo

comment: We stayed in a pool villa for 8 nights, wish it was 18! The villas are amazing, worth upgrading to the level for the private beach and all inclusive makes it even better.  All of the staff are super friendly and go out of their way to make you welcome, a special thanks to Ari and Yudi in the Level Lounge, Angga at the Level beach and pool and Rini and Nisi at breakfast each morning, you made our stay even more special. See you next year!
author: Andy B

comment: It was a super lovely stay for me and my husband. The staff surprise us with a special arrangement for celebrating our honeymoon. Also on the other room for our friend’s celebration of their first pregnancy 💕 we all are amazed with the beautiful landscape of Melia Bali. Perfect combination of nature and Balinese architecture.  Pool has warm water, so it’s very shooting and relaxing.  Beautiful beach too! Breakfast was fantastic…  Special thanks to Ms. Gita - Guest Experience Manager for making sure that our stay is unforgettable.
author: PN

comment: We stay For 3 day 2 night, they Have canoeing , fun wheel, paddle and byecilling. Thank you For Irul and Agung for play with us in Carnival, they Have amzing game and activity.  We done fish feeding at 11 o’clock wih Ibu Dayu and Miss Aci. Thank you For Made an amzing holiday For us. Definitely Will come back to Melia Hotel
author: Wahyuni

comment: The hotel is really fantastic, the "terrible" reviews on here are ridiculous!!! I agree the rooms are a little dated, but how long do you spend in the room anyway, and worth paying the extra for the suite for more space and definitely worth going all inclusive as the food here is fantastic, beautifully cooked and presented.  The staff are very helpful, cant do enough for you and the service is great.  Maybe the people who are waiting upto 40 minutes for drinks should go to the bar themselves🤔 as the staff never stop! An amazing time in an amazing place
author: Laura

comment: Very good food (breakfast and dinner). However after 2 hours of waiting for the room, drinking water was missing , television didn t work well. Furthermore poor service at the pool ( my order never arrived) and at breakfast ( table was not cleaned, no coffee served) chaotic and not organised! Staff from reception recommended me to use google in order to find restaurants nearby! All in all, sad experience for a 5* hotel!
author: Isabelle R

comment: My love to Melia hotels has started exactly from Melia Bali. The best kids club ever with different activities, attentive to the details staff among kids club, gym, restaurant. Many thanks for the box classes :-) evening marshmallows ;) and beach exploring for the kids;)
author: Helen S

comment: If you are looking for a beach resort holiday with perfect beach, pool and weather, look no further. If you are looking for a foodie escape then I might go with a hotel situated more centrally in Bali However a perfect oasis if you want to just get away and chill.  Four stars due to the fact that the prices of the resort food were a bit on the high side together with the fact that the hotel taxi kept being recommended. If you want to get to Denpasar, Seminyak, Kira, Sanur go with a bluebird.
author: Stella

comment: Melia Hotel is the great hotel that I ever visit. Amazing place to stay, great location and views of nature. The place is very accommodating. We also can use bike to and enjoy the view by riding bicycle, play kano. The staffs also very helpful.
author: Jeany J

comment: The person taking care of the sports court, had serves us well in Archery tennis and badminton. We and our family had a good time. Court kept clean and neat. If you are looking for some fun times with friends and family.
author: Corian C

comment: Melia Kids Club is the best so far. We stayed at 2 other 5 star hotel in Bali which have Kids Club, our kids ware vary happy with all the activities at Melia Kids Club. Thanks again for Bu Sasih and Team.
author: Surya T

comment: A Bali classic hotel with beautiful grounds. We were staying for a 2 night getaway for NYE and booked for the dinner. Mustafa made the evening for us balancing attentiveness with care and leave aloneness. The meal was memorable but not as much as breakfast the next day. We werent going fancy so it was buffet breakfast with 1 million people. My body language must have said it all as Mustafa extracted me from the chaos and took me to Aladdin's cave. Private breakfast room, space, quiet and lobster, more lobster and just a bit more to recover from NYE. True testimony to someone passionate and experienced with people and making them a priority. thank you Mustafa and Melia.
author: Nickneal

comment: Having a great time staying at Mulia. Lots of great facilities and friendly staff.  Amazing food and clean resort. Everyone had a smile!  Darma helped us make tridatu bracelets for a great souvenir of our honey moon!
author: Andrew

comment: Facilities,Staff,Location... Cannot fault this resort. Highly recommended for anybody wanting to get away to fully relax with kids and the whole family. So many choices from food to daily activities with all staff willing to help in any way
author: D. Meredith

comment: We have been to Bali many times as a family and always like to try new hotels. The Melia Bali was the first hotel we have ever returned to for a second stay but after having such a wonderful time the previous year we thought we’d return! The Melia did not disappoint....the family suites are perfect for families of 5 like ours and some of the meals we’ve had in this hotel are amongst the best in Bali! By far the highlight of this trip both times has been the Kids Club, hence our return. The staff is outstanding and nothing is ever a problem! Their love for children and their job is genuine and I would return again just to see the staff that we have all formed friendships with. I must make mention to Dani, Sasih, Finda, Dayu, Graney and Resi as their customer service is above and
author: Anthea

comment: We stayed in melia hotel nusa dua for 5days very recomended all servise and staff very friendly. My daughter play a lot in kids club she is very happy coz mba Dayu staff in kids club very friendly and kind with my daughter... Melia nusa dua bali i very recomended!!
author: Mrs. Angela

comment: My daughter and I really enjoyed our stay at Melia Nusa Dua. The resort has a lot of great things going for it (private beach, watersports, nearby surf break, good gym, Bali Collection shopping nearby, very helpful and friendly staff, comfortable rooms, good Covid-19 management) which all made for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. We were there for 6 nights. Also very good value for money. We will be back again
author: Kell M

comment: Having stayed at the Melia Bali many times and always had the perfect holiday. This year was no different. I would however make a couple of constructive criticisms. The new family level beach area does disturb the hitherto peace and tranquility of the Adults only level beach. The introduction of pedal go karts is a disaster waiting to happen, the paths around the resort are narrow there isn't room for pedestrians and some out of control go karts, someone is going to get really hurt.  I would like to praise the fantastic staff who looked after us for a month. I would to thank: Level office Ayu and Doni Level Beach Darma Angga Prinnga Oka Juli Arta Resti Sorento Breakfast Parwati Sagung Karin Nisa Dayu Sateria Restaurant Oki Adi Agung Eky Wisnu Bakti Komang Rahayu Wahayu Basma
author: Pak Paul

comment: We spent just over 2 weeks at the hotel and have to say stay was amazing. The setting is beautiful, the garden and beach is breathtaking, And the staff so kindly thankyou Veren and Gusti from minibar are simply delightful and really can't do enough for you. now you would think that is what you get us standard at a 5* resort but i can assure you it's really not always the case. all in all we had the most relaxing holliday in an Melia Bali.  Highly recommended for anyone who needs to relax.   Thank you to all the hotel who made our holliday perfect.
author: Vladimir G

comment: We could enjoy many days at the beach, drinking and eating at Level place of Meliá Bali.  We want to thanks Mr Artha. The best seevice we got at the hotel during our stay.. He always attended us wirh a smile and he always remembered our names and our preferences. Great job Artha. Thanks from Ana and Miguel.
author: Miguel Ángel Or...

comment: We stayed here 5 days in total during the pandemic.  Here are what we experienced at this hotel ;  The Pros : 1.Stunning Ground 2.Very Clean Pools  3.Well Maintained Overall 4.Breakfast was Good 5.Calm Beach 6.Many activities on the Resort 7.We received Warm and TOP Service from MOST of the staff there, Thank You especially to all staff member in the breakfast area.  The Bads : There is only 1 issue though.We are Bali Regulars and loved Nusa Dua area. We also had stayed in many Resorts in Nusa Dua, however I need to tell My Check In Experience in Melia. I was uncomfortable of the way I was Handled by Mrs S at the reception on 28 Sept.  Perhaps mostly Melia guests are International Guest and I got the feeling that Mrs S tried to give us Hardtime.  Everytime we got little request
author: Andrea Aprillano

comment: We are staying at the Melia Bali and since we arrived we can only say that if we already had experience in the Melia (Zanzibar) This one has exceeded our expectations!! The attention mainly all the staff is SIMPLY EXCELLENT!!! The facilities, food and etc. etc. make the Melia Bali Hotel the best option in Nusa Dua
author: Jeannette Josefina Valero Albarran

comment: We had an amazing time at Hotel Bali, couldnt fault it at all.  We booked The Level all inclusive which i would definitely recommend.  The food was great, we tried all the  restaurants and never had a bad meal, staff were fantastic, so nice and helpful.
