Especially Basma, Satya, Kamang, Oki from Sateria, Juli, Angga, Atawangua, Oka from Beach/pool.  Yudi our concierge was fab.  Soma best tour guide and amazing singing to keep us entertained.   Everyone was so friendly and polite.  Went to Sorrento quite a bit too and all staff lovely, sorry didnt get names.  Overall the best holiday we've been on and will definitely be back.
author: Gascoignes

comment: We loved our holiday here. Great spot for families. The kids club was amazing.. lots of activities to keep the kids occupied and a great place for them to make friends. DANI was unreal with our children and she also did some babysitting for our younger one. Kids loved her and she felt totally comfortable. The resort itself is beautiful, and the service was amazing. Staff were very friendly and kind, room kept very clean. We lost out ipad during our stay and the staff handed it in and it was returned to us. I cant really fault it and would definitely recommend.
author: Terri.b

comment: Perfectly located in Nusa Dua, Melia Bali is just a great choice for family vacation with Kids. Beach is peaceful, quiet and kids friendly, hotel arranges several activities throughout the day. Food is amazing (specially if you choose to book The Level Service for breakfast!!). Rooms are nice, well maintained and well serviced. The facilities are well maintained.  But best of all are all the team at Melia, always with a smile and ready to help, they will make sure you have the best of the holidays!!  Absolutely recommended!!
author: Ignacio

comment: This is definitely the best beachfront resort to come with your family and have lots of fun! We loved all the activities that they have included, we had so much fun with archery but our favorite was definitely squash and kayaking. The staff at the restaurant were super friendly. Pak Naya was our waiter and he was always giving his best and making sure we were having a great time. We were surprised to hear some of the staff speak perfect Spanish. Pak Sumertha at the restaurant knew so much about Mexico and our culture; chatting with him was a bliss.  We stayed at a garden villa and my sister at a lagoon pool. Both rooms were truly amazing and perfect for our needs.  Without a doubt, when we come back to Bali for a family trip we will definitely come back to Meliá.
author: Daniela Mora

comment: We have just left the Melia after staying in the Level. The service was outstanding from check in to check out. The Level staff went out of their way to help us with anything and everything we needed..The resteraunts, bars and pool staff were great. We have been to Bali many times and it was our first stay at Nusa Dua. The resort is terrific with plenty of activities to keep you going if your interested or you can just relax. Only downside if any is there is no shopping nearby if that's what your interested in. But as a relaxing holiday it's perfect. Clean rooms, great air-conditioning and the Level pool is private and quiet. The beach is good to swim in when the tides in as well.Special mentions to Karin in Sorrento Resteraunt..... Artawiguna,Juli , Oka and Darma in the Level
author: darryldavey111719

comment: I've just spent 5 nights at the Melia, the Resort is absolutely beautiful, perfect location for a little more relax time. Staff are so welcoming and helpful, food was delicious with great kids meals available.   Myself and 2 daughters had a lagoon access room which was great for the girls!   My youngest attended kids club, at her own choice a majority of the days there! I couldn't keep her away, which is so unlike her! The staff, Graney, Dani, Dewi, Resi, Tya, Aci, Sasih and Maria were just beautiful, so caring and fun!  Thank you for making Mariahs visits to kids club so enjoyable!
author: Channy P

comment: Stayed for 3 nights in The Level family room, and the experience was awesome. Although the family room is dated, and only has 1 bathroom (plus 1 toilet), the whole Level experience more than made up for it. Overall, awesome service from the staff. Special shout out to Doni and Aria from the Level lounge.
author: Joe E

comment: My husband, my daughter and myself just back from Melia Bali Resort, it was beyond my expectations. From the beginning I didn't want to go to Bali, I was very skeptical, once I arrived at Melia Bali Resort straightway I got in love with the place.  When we got off from the taxi we've been greeted by beautiful and amazing staff. At the reception, we have been served in such a very helpful and professional manner with a welcome drink and a big smile. Everything looked like I live in Paradise. I loved every single moment of my stay there. OMG and the kids club was the best thing to make our holiday PERFECT. My daughter loved all the staff who works there. Dani (my daughter's favorite), Sasih, Dayu, Finda, Graney, and Resi made my daughter feel loved and looked after. There were
author: Gypsy Queen

comment: We haven’t been there yet but I cannot wait to go!! The guest service has been amazing via email. Quick replies and excellent information provided by Mega Agustina! I work for hotels and I know how difficult can be replying the same person once and again when arrival is so far in time. I’m sure we will not regret staying our last honeymoon days in this hotel. Looking forward for our arrival!!! Thank you!!
author: SilS

comment: Had a wonderful week at the Melia.  Started off with a few issues which were rectified straight away.  The  amazing staff is truly the strenght of this resort as they try their very best to make your stay as comfortable as possible.  Special mention to Ms Sunarini, front of house who assisted and also Mr Dharma at the Level beach and Mr Aria at the fire pit lounge.  The ladies at the spa were just incredible.   Thank you for making our holiday a very special one.      The resort is great for families with kids activies and cute outdoor cinema setting but also really good for couples.   The beach restaurant is great and beautifully lit at night.  Live music every night completes the atmosphere.     We loved the food at the beach restaurant, specially the pizzas and pasta.
author: Mikika08

comment: The hotel was beautiful. But the service was terrible. We booked a cabana to spend the day there. It’s 600k per day. There was no service at all. The cabana was not taken care of( looking old and dirty) not made up.  We had to go to the waiters to ask for the menu,  to order food, to order drinks. Nobody came to take our dirty plates away.  For such a luxury hotel and the price we paid....it was awful
author: chouchoubali

comment: Today is the last day of our stay in Melia and we’re really delighted with the time we spent here. Thank you for the kind and caring service. It’s maybe the most friendly service during our stay on Bali :) Big thanks to Suarbawa, a guy from minibar stuff for his kindness and well-timed refreshments :)
author: Elena B

comment: Perfect place to stay in Bali,  they cover all your needs in the best way even without ask for it sometimes.Very smily  personel and every visitor is a special guest for them.Beautyful gardens and we stay long to enjoy the beach. A little problem with breakfast as the effort to satisfy all traditional needs of the people, make us have limited choice for what we realy enjoy to eat.We will visited them again .
author: Poli K

comment: Me and my family had a roudtrip from Jakarta to Bali. It was exhausting so i have to choose the best hotel for me, my husband, and our lil ones. Melia also provide a pretty private beach. I was feeling safe from this pandemic because they keep the hotel very clean with their strict covid19 protocol.  Melia definitely one of a kind. Service was excellent. My kids love the kids club and bonfire so much!! (Big thanks for Ms Dayu, She's so helpful. :) My 4yearold girl, Maira, requested Ms Dayu her fav movie, which is Rapunzel  for movie night then Ms Dayu prepared for her. My kids was so happy!! We spent 3 nights and we never get bored.  While the kids at the kids club, i was having so much amazing time at the beach club. Also their Spa was sooo affordable and surprisingly VERY
author: Aw Jamil

comment: Melia Bali is an awesome place to stay in Nusa Dua, The staff is amazing especially Kevin in the sports area. He really looked after us and made our experience amazing, he showed us how to use the golf simulator and the gym. Thankyou Kevin
author: Brady R

comment: We stayed at Melia for 5 night and I wish it could be longer. It’s a wonderful place! Service is excellent! All staff are very polite and friendly as well as informative and helpful. We booked the junior suite and the room was lovely, lots of space, with balcony overlooking the lagoon. For breakfast you are spoilt for choice. Lots to choose from, everything freshly cooked. There’s a kids club and many activities you can participate in. We absolutely loved our stay and will definitely come back. Thank you
author: Daniella80

comment: Great 5 star hotel. A place that with a bunch activities!!! They got basketball court, tennis court, padel court, archery.  Its really fit in for my energizer boys. I liked the junior activities because my son its not a kids club type.   And the staff really helpful for us. They tried to full fill our happiness.  Surprisingly, now...my kiddos enjoy Melia kids club 🤣😂 They can attached to my boys with the beach hunting and free flow pop corn 😙  My kiddos knew all the activities team, its like a friend for them. They will bike all around the hotel and i felt safe.   My son also like the carnival, gokart, and spiderman etc time...  Thank you for Bu dayu, pak irul, alep, agus, ian, bu sasih (and team) for always try my kiddos happy. I really appreciated your proffesional work.
author: Anseti

comment: It’s a beautiful hotel with beautiful grounds and a really nice beach. The food by the beach is excellent too. The best thing is the excellent customer service wherever you go. I spent a lot of time at the fitness center and other facilities like archery, biking, basketball and tennis within its ground. The staff at the fitness center and the pool are always warm, friendly and helpful. Thank you Pak Irul and all the other guys for taking care of us so well.  You guys are amazing. I highly recommend this hotel.
author: Jo-anna L

comment: Melia has a lot of free activity, such as canoeing, archery, basketball, cycling and many more. Excellent breakfast by the beach & comfortable room. The staff very friendly & helpful , after all i will come back there for my next holiday.
author: Ko J

comment: We had a great time joining activities at Melia. My daughter was playing archery, toasted marshmellow, playing at the beach and had movie night. Shout out to the staff that did great job entertaining the kids. Especially to Dayu, Dani, Tya, Resi, Alep, Lisyad, Sasih, Aci.
author: Grizelda M

comment: It was a great place to stay when I need help with the room Sumatra went out of he way to help and fixed the problem instantly. The staff where all amazing and very helpful.  I will definitely stay there again.Bali is a very special place and I understand now why people go there.
author: Kate G

comment: We booked for Lagoon Access and we got what we need in there. Spacious room, clean and complete amenities inside bathroom. The staff was amazing. The place is huge and we can find a lot of activities there. My concern is the design was outdated, the bed was comfort but not that great.it was decent. The ambience is quite dark and gloomy. The food need improvement in taste. But overall we satisfied with the services, staff and overall activities.
author: Daniel K

comment: What absolute joy, we were looked after from the moment we got out of the taxi! My (adult) daughter and I didn’t have a booking, we just arrived to see if the hotel could give us a little bit of bliss for our last two days in Bali and they didn’t disappoint! Thank you to all the wonderful staff for literally spoiling us, especially Witana at the front desk who couldn’t do enough to accommodate us. He’s a great salesman too, we ended up in one of the beautiful Villas! The attention to detail was incredible, we had our own private pool, garden, outside dining area, relaxing bungalow etc and that was just in the garden. Inside the villa was luxurious and I cannot wait to return, this time with my husband, as it’s very all very romantic!! Thank you again for the perfect 2 day stay
author: ElizabethKeaneSykes

comment: We stayed 3 weeks in Melia Bali . This was for us the second time in the same resort . We stayed in the level romance room which was nice but just needs a bit of tlc . But what makes the hotel TOP is the people working there . They made are stay fantastic . A special thanks to oka , angga , arta , darma , prinnga , Juli ...these people take care of you on the beach in an incredible way . Really top people !!  And also a really big thanks to yudy from the level reception , he made our stay more like a 7 star stay .. he organised everything for us ... It is people like these and the once mentioned above that makes a hotel . Melia should be very happy having them around ..   We can not wait to book again  Christoff, mirka , ella
author: demey1971

comment: I always come to this hotel everytime I go to Bali and always please with my stay. I love the beautiful well maintained garden, so many activities in the hotel. Not to forget with the service given by the staff. Special thanks to Miss Gita who helped a lot with my Melia Rewards problem, even after I check out she keeps trying to resolve it. Top notch service. I also would like to thank you to Miss Dayu, Dani, Aci, Sasih who's taking care of my children and make them always happy. I will never stop to keep coming back to this hotel.
author: Shnt

comment: The best eco resort in Bali! Their staff super friendly and helpful especially their Guest Experience Manager Ms. Gita.  Their beach very clean and their foods very tasty! We staying with 2 couples friends from Turkey that celebrating their honeymoon in Bali. And we love our stay in Melia Bali. It was the best experience ever!!  They had many pacakge options from Bed and Breakfast, Half Board and Full board.  If you got more budget go stay in The Level with full board package!   Will be back to stay there again for sure!
author: Lalu Taupan S

comment: Traveling with an 18 month old is never easy, but the staff at Melia, particularly everyone at The Level, were fantastic. A big shout-out to Dewi at the Kids Club and babysitting service for being so fantastic with our son. Would definitely recommend.  Jeremy, Hayley & Miles
author: Jeremy M

comment: Went with wife and our 2 boys ages 3 and 1, had an amazing time, loved everthing about this resort. I cannot fault anything about this plce. I have to say the all inclusive is a MUST!  Staff a very friendly and helpful!  A special thank you to Resi and Finda from the kid's club, they went above and beyond when babysitting our boys and just in general helped us with whatever and whenever we needed them, much appreciated.  Will definitely be going back!
author: Muhsin E

comment: Best Resort For Familyyy...Amazing stay we had.. really enjoy our time here.. We stayed for 4D3N and never go anywhere because all the activities from the Kids Club. Kiddos had so much fun and loved all the activities such as Marsmallow toast every sunset time, Balinese dance lesson and more.. Special thanks to miss Acik from the Kids Club and the rest of Kids club team miss Dani, Resi, Tya & Sasih..we really appriciate it..  The staff from reception desk and restaurant were super friendly. Thanks to whole Melia team..  We definetly will come back on lebaran  holiday (early may) to celebrate my daughter’s Birthday, we already booked family suite from our travel agent.. see u soon Meliaaa.. kiddos can’t wait to see miss Acik and friends again :)
author: Yuda T

comment: We stayed at Melia Bali for 4 nights in lagoon access room. Beautiful hotel with nice surroundings. The room was very clean, nice, and comfy bed. The service was excellent, friendly and helpfull staff. My kids love the marshmallow time and the kids club. The breakfast was great. Nice pool with warm water. Cons, the jet spray in the toilet too short. Will definitely come back to Melia Bali!
author: Claudia

comment: Edmund and Alep in the fitness centre, sports courts and pool areas were amazing. We are leaving after 11 nights here and are now planning when we can come back. Also our personal driver Eddy who continually went above and beyond for our family and showed us some of the most beautiful places in Bali.
author: Nadia P

comment: We have just returned to NZ after a family holiday at Melia Bali.  Grandparents, parents and children ranging from 4 to 8 years old.  The Kids Club was absolutely fantastic. Lovely caring caregivers and lots for the children to do. Plenty of space to kick and play with their balls and the pool was great as well. The staff were friendly and gave great service and the property is beautiful with its plantings, water features etc.  The breakfast had lots of choice and plenty of room for large tables. We would definitely return.
author: Judy H

comment: Personale services of High Quality  We a familie of ten had a memorable stay at Melia. The pool staff Ian, a friendly an a Leader type person managed very well this outlet together with his colleques  Alep and Gunk. At the batek class Made, shows how simple to make batek painting...bravo, also assistance by Ian. it seems that he is everywhere.  At the breakfast  restaurant El Patio, waiter Sutardja and waitress Indah, connecting with guest with warm friendly smile. Budi, the tennis staff of quality with his experinces and a wise person to talk too. On the whole Melia Bali has a Quality of  excellence service personale Once, a CEO of a famous change hotel Quote :- A good Staff are the Real asset Last but not least, good and friendly driver Made Toya and Sutardja are highly
author: Radin Kasbani

comment: Really Nice place in a lush tropical Forest⭐️ Beach is very beautifull ⭐️⭐️⭐️ We are a family of 4 with 2 kids of 10 and 8, Victor and Constance. The best point of our holidays was the kids club. Such a GRÉÂT TEAM ♥️ Very spécial thanks to Maria, Dewi, Aci. My daughter spend so much gréât moments with you. You were little Angels for her. A lot of activity, kindness…you do very well your jobs. Thanks so much 🙏🙏🙏
author: nvb1107

comment: Melia was the perfect holiday for several families with small kids. The kids had so much fun in the pool, at the beach and at kids club. The adults had the opportunity to properly relax and the service was outstanding. Staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and ensure we enjoyed our stay. Resti at the level pool was outstanding!
author: Surfing B

comment: What a wonderful tour we had with Ephy leading us as our tour guide. I had seen Ephy around the pool and he was so lovely and polite.We were delighted to see he was our guide at the Uluwatu Temple where he kept us safe from those ‘ cheeky monkeys!!’ and was so caring for his group. Thank you Ephy , we will see you
author: naomi f

comment: This is my first visit to Bali and I will spend few months exploring Bali. My first journey is in this hotel. The room is nice, the garden is beautiful and lots of activities. The staffs are very helpful, Epi at the Front Desk, Eky at the beach side restaurant and most of all the The Lady Manager Ms. Gita who assist me with things related to my Visa information. Last but not least the food is ao good though it's a bit pricey but worth to try.
author: Fadil M

comment: A great venue in Bali with beautiful gardens, great restaurants, and wonderful helpful staff. A special mention regarding the super Level Service on offer. Our super holiday was made extra special with assistance from all the Level staff but a special mention of, Ayu, Yuli, Sudarma & Agus.  A hotel that belongs in Paradise.
author: PHILIP L

comment: when unloading luggage, no staff approached.  they were all busy with the  group customer.  after a bit of tragedy my luggage fell, the staff came to help and apologized.  we understand they are all busy.  My daughter got crown made from coconut leave when we check-in, she was happy. I got nice impression after my luggage fell.   Got upgraded room due to promo by travel agent. Deluxe room upgraded to Junior suite with lagoon access room.   My daughter loves here because she loves to play at kids club and beach.   Buffett breakfast was served.
author: sefitiana

comment: The photos are exactly how they seem I was a bit hesitant when booking this place but it was such a wonderful family friendly place I would recommend it to everyone.  Pros - friendly staff very attentive and kind. Really nice breakfast with a variety of food. Clean and very well managed resort.  Cons - Everything was so expensive inside the hotel. From food to drinks everything was expensive including their taxi services.
author: shaminey

comment: We really enjoyed our stay at Melià hotel. An atmosphere and an authentic atmosphere. The staff took care of every detail. Various and very nice activities (bike ride, paddle, canoe, surf, snorkeling, campfire and marshmallow, good music, massage, etc.) We ate very well both at breakfast and at the beach restaurant. A little wink to Aris who is very endearing.
author: Feriel BBM

comment: We have thoroughly loved our time here. The Uluwatu excursion is a must do with Soma and Agon. It was a lot of fun, very very entertaining and informative. On the way back to the hotel Soma got the whole bus singing with his ukulele and vast knowledge of songs.
author: Michelle J

comment: I had 2 perfect weeks at Melia Bali Hotel but one of the most important aspects were my training sessions with Ian. Thanks to him I managed to keep my great condition and even make some significant progress despite being on a holiday. I happily recommend that anyone who comes here trains with him at least 1 time... He is very patient, focused and knows how to bring the best out of his clients! My holiday was 10 times better after this.
author: Vlad

comment: My 8th y.o. Boy really Happy Stayed there especially Because they have kids club with of children activity... After stayed 2 Nights, he already Asked when We Will Come back 😊. The supervisor in kids club Mrs. Dayu (hopefully I wasnt wrong spell her name) is very nice and helpful.   Surely Will Come back
author: Jeniffer N

comment: The hotel is clean, nice, lot of program and activities in the resort (water sports, archery, carnival games, pirate party, tennis, squash, gym) and specily kids club. We stayed almost 1 month during pandemi (PPKM) at lagoon access and never boring. Rooms was nice, pool were super big, staff super nice and friendly. Thank you very much for kids club team....you are AMAZING. Specialy ibu dayu for orgenize great birthday party  sasi, tya, resi, dayu k, gung mas, ian, alep and make our kids happy as always. also for pak Irul (the seahorses) you are so funy and thank you for fun pirate party. Not forget also Agus the Big Man.  Lot of thing to do at the resort, recomended for you are travelling with kids. And great place to during lock down  Definitely come back. Thank you Melia bali
author: Yulia

comment: I really like the hotel.  I like its unique atmosphere, the staff is very friendly, especially in the kids club. So many thanks to Maria in the kids club because she is very hard-working and she can speak with children and they like her.  Best hotel in Bali
author: Darya G

comment: World class team of staff at Melia Bali, Nysa Dua. Activities team with Agus, Ryan and Agung are top quality instructors, making pool activities great fun every single day. Service by the poolside was perfect. What a great team of staff. Really made my stay wonderful! See you all again soon!
author: Ben F

comment: Of all the hotels/resorts we went this was our longest stay and the best!! Seriously. Even my elder mom enjoyed Melia. Everyday filled with lots of activities. Cycling, they also have that kind of unique cycle that are only available in Melia. The pool ahh what can I say. Swimming in front of our room (lagoon access) was the coolest thing. But my favorites were the sports activities.  Pak Diarsa was the person who guided us with all the sports: from canoe to badminton, tennis and squash. Also Dayu who was very helpful in arranging the activities. Big appreciation to all the housekeeping staff who used complete APD. Also my mom enjoyed interacting with the Restaurant staff. Melia, perfect!
author: paul

comment: Excellent stay. Great staff and variety of restaurants, bars and entertainment. Pattri in Sorrento resturant is a very helpful and knowledgeable lady and a great asset. The yoga instructors are amazing. The kids club looks so good. We would return here.
author: K8y

comment: The resort itself was pretty good, but the customer service that Soma provided was incredible. He made our stay so much better, consistently exceeding expectations and going out of his way to make our experience better.  He is a standout staff member at your resort, and deserves a big commendation!!!   Thank you for having us Melia, we will be back :)
author: Josh wood

comment: I've been visiting this hotel minimum twice a year. Since 15year ago.  Quite area. Perfect services. Good food and the most important thing is kids friendly.  They have a lots of kids activities (every day)   In this pandemic. No worry. They have a strict health protocols.   Thanks to Melia team  Pak Sutarja, Wayan Dangin, Yuli. Jodie, Trisiawati, Sutarja, Putra Asmara,  Sumartha and Made at Canoe   Will be back for sure
author: Nunun Sativa

comment: Amazing experience from start to finish.  Staff fantastic.  Options for food great.  Kids club okay but think it needs more options for bugger kids (my son was 9 and needed more - my 5 year okd was quite happy).  Staff in there also great.    Did the all inclusive Level family and was worth the money.  Everything that we ate and drank was included.  Options were great amongst the five restaurants onsite.  The Level made it feel a little nore special.  Located in a compound of resorts, it’s the last one on the right as you face out to the water.  The beach is on a reef so pretty safe for kids and no real waves.  Nice little market next door that does amazing massages, cheap laundry, food and the hair braiding.  It was just fantastic.  Also check out Water Bom water park - so much
author: Brendan C

comment: Everything about our stay at Melia exceeded our expectations. The grounds were stunning, our suite very comfortable, and the food was top quality. I would highly recommend the upgrade to the Level and get the all-inclusive package; as a tired parent it was absolutely worth it.  And to all the staff who looked after us during our stay - thank you! To the gorgeous ladies who took such care of our daughter in the kids club and all the staff at the Level pool; you guys are the real MVP’s.   See you next year! From Miss Amelia, Mr Rick (always Prost), and Ms Ally (double-double).
author: Allison C

comment: No regrets at all. It was my second visit to Melia Bali in last 3 month. Good service, good environment, very nice people. Clean and well preserved room. Nice and spacious garden. Superb jogging track. Great grilled king prawn at Sateria. Room for improvement: missing the hand towels
author: nadyapramudita

comment: My husband and I stayed at Melia for 5 nights and our experience was absolutely exceptional from the minute we got into our transfer car at 3am. The room was clean and large and the bed extra comfy. Food and drinks at all the restaurants and bars was fantastic. But the best part of all was the service at Melia, which was simply outstanding. In particular, I want to thank Yudi and Dewa Ayu (The Level), and Darma and Sari for taking such wonderful care of us during our stay. You will be missed! But we will be back, with the rest of the family next time!
author: Skye M

comment: Always love coming to this hotel. Good food from the restaurant by the beach, love the seafood platter. The cafe by the pool, Kopi Petani, has great coffee and desserts. Nice ambience and comfy feels.  Cute spot for instagram too! Will definitely come back next time!
author: Winny Christy

comment: Recently back from a 10 night stay at the Melia Bali. I had to drag my wife to Bali as she was concerned that it was not a safe place for a family holiday. The Melia Nusa Dua Resort and the people in Bali have changed her mind forever. After 10 nights she and my 6 year old daughter didn't want to leave. What a relaxing venue. Excellent Kids Club and the staff were amazing, I hardly saw my daughter all holiday as there was always something exciting going on at the kids club day and night. A big thank you to Dani and the Kids Club team so professional and friendly,  you are amazing.  We will be back to see you next year.  Please do not change a thing.
author: Andrew E

comment: We really enjoyed our stay in the Melia Bali. The location is excellent in a quite area with direct beach access. The hotel also offers a wide selection of activities. I can highly recommend a boxing course with Ian, the fitness instructor! He is very knowledgable and friendly.
author: Hans D

comment: Hotel is extremely beautiful with almost all the amenities you may want from a resort . Very well maintained with staff who are always more then happy to help you out. Huge property with beach area completely useless at the time of my visit . Great pool and food
author: Brijesh24

comment: My favorite experience was at fitness center with coach Ian, very professional, amazing, and friendly also. We work hard but we enjoy, danse also, with my Playlist.  This hotel was my 2nd place at Bali, very beautiful place, nature preserved, architecture,room, beach, food, restaurant, employees, everything is almost perfect, sweet memories ! I enjoyed the spa less, my pedicure was below my expectations, but I relaxed.
author: annah m

comment: After more than 30 years, at the beginning of October 2020 for 3 nights I finally returned to stay at the hotel that was once a favorite when going to Bali in the 80s. It turns out that this hotel is still outstanding in terms of service, facilities and atmosphere. I originally booked at Lagoon Access but later upgraded to a villa. Truly a very enjoyable and unforgettable vacation. Thank you to the management and staff who continue to provide special services even in difficult times. Hopefully after the pandemic period passes, this hotel can achieve glory.  And one thing, I can bet I'll be back here as soon as possible
author: Sonny Gunawan

comment: Melia Bali was amazing, we stayed there for 8 nights and it was like a little paradise. Everyone make you feel like being part of their family. People are so friendly and they would do everything to please you.  Just amazing. We would happily come back again.
author: Viorel

comment: There are only a few true all inclusive stay places in bali, this was one of them. The rooms were nice, the pool and garden were maintained quite nicely. The food was delicious! The staff was also so kind and helpful during my stay. Especially a staff named juliawan. 6 star service. Please pass my thanks to him as my stay was much better because of him being there! The other staff were also usually quite nice. The beach was kept clean. Will return in the future!
author: bob5554355

comment: We had the best time, Mr Sumartha we can’t thank you enough for everything. Our stay was unforgettable, amazing and we definitely are coming BACK in December. Our room was beautiful, clean and comfortable. Breakfast had everything you could imagine, such a great variety. The staff are so friendly and accommodating. Best cocktails ……  We highly recommend Melia Bali  See you all for New Years Eve  Jude & Melanie
author: Melanie P

comment: We had a great time with friends and family away last weekend! There are plenty of activities cater for everyone. Ranging from kids club activities to a variety of water sports or tennis.... Amazing breakfast with breathtaking views of the beautiful sea.   PS, make sure you get a Jr. Suite lagoon to maximise your stay
author: Anonymous

comment: Why average ? Its just like the other great hotels located in Nusa Dua. Its a family friendly hotel, with their marshmallow-BBQ in the afternoon at the beach, with their kids activities inside. One of a great hotels in Nusa Dua that provides everything inside the hotel, in my opinion, this kind of hotel is a really good for family.
author: Meyly Anggraini

comment: Hi! I went to Melia Bali for our babymoon last month and we had such a great time. Good food, lovely atmosphere, friendly staff, kids friendly (they have multiple activities for kids such as movie night and marshmallow toasting), and most importantly they apply the health protocols everywhere. Thanks Melia Bali. Will definitely come back!
author: Niken Anjani

comment: Excellent 5 star resort in Nusa Dua area with beach access and great pool.  Room service very good. Hotel staff very polite and helpfull.  The food was good but very limited vegetarian food options. We stayed for 3 nights. The rooms are small and a bit old but very clean and well maintained.
author: Prabhav08

comment: Stayed in pool access room for 2 weeks. It is my longest stay ever in a hotel. Really recommend this type of room. The restaurant facing the beach is the best in Nusa dua in my opinion. So many activities can be done here with family or friends. Kayaking, cycling, tennis court, paddling, and its all for free. Surely will come back here
author: Hasby J

comment: Everything's excelent, room, free facilities (pool, canoe, bycycle, beach, kids club). But limited variety of breakfast menu (maybe it cause of pandemic). Room 31112, thank you, we had best sleep quality after a nice long day!!! :-))))
author: Vinca Rosea Agia

comment: Hola Melia Bali..I just wrote to tell you that my family and I had a wonderful stay at your hotel on 18/3/2020 till 20/3/20..We had a very welcoming from Reception team with a very nice welcome coconut drink upon check-in..We also had a very welcoming and delicious breakfast at El-Patio with personalized service by Mr. Wayan Japa..A great conversation with him about Melia Bali..He is diamond in FNB..Please send my regards to him..  Oh one thing I can’t forget, Ms Dayu from Kids Club, very polite, friendly and courteous..Keep her ok..? She is someone whom we rarely find nowadays..  Hope to see all of your soon after this Covid-19 reduce..All the best from me and my family..  Best regards, Nuh Shakirin 🇲🇾
author: Norjazai

comment: A great resort only let down by staff shortages as a result of covid.  One of the restaurants (Japanese) was closed during our stay.  It opened the day we left!  The remaining ones had an adequate but limited menu.  The room was great with access to a pool right outside the door.  Staff were always courteous and helpful.
author: dvdstn

comment: Amazing staff and service. Bed very comfy. Water activities available with a on the beach location. Everything very clean, food and drinks were all great. Highly recommend the all inclusive package. A special mention to Pringga for looking after us so well by the pool and beach.
author: liltravellerAus

comment: This is our favourite place in Bali, our second home !!! The staff are amazing, service is A+ quality, food is beautiful and the best cocktails. Mr Sumartha you ALWAYS make our stay better than the last one, our room was just gorgeous, we were spoilt from you so much. Bakti the bartender makes the best drinks, I call them his signature cocktails. The resort is always clean and nothing is a hassle for the staff, everyone is friendly and always smiling. We CANT wait to come back, we have booked our wedding for early January 2024 at this resort and we are so looking forward to it. See you all again very soon.
author: Melanie P

comment: Was very happy and comfortable at the room 3117  _ 3118 with the services of our FB manager Mr Dewa with such as a big surprise of our birthday cakes during breakfast without any knowing from others. Because of his attraction and best hospitality he made the atmosfer of hotel become wonderful and memorable experience in our lifetime.thanks alot and best wishes to all of your teamwork..best regards
author: Miasta

comment: We had a wunderful stay in Bali. The Hotel was wunderful and the Staff was great, allways friendly, helpfull and so lovely. Our Kids love to go to the Kids Club, thanks to Resi and her Collegs, the Boys love to play with them. There is nothing we miss!!!
author: Die K

comment: We spent two wonderful weeks here. We had great service everywhere on site and really enjoyed all the restaurants. Good beach area and entertainment. Plus activities each day if you want to get involved. The place is beautiful and we also loved our room. Couldn't of wanted more for an all inclusive and our room service. Great time. Only point I would make is over Xmas there were lots of children. So not always great when the pool is full of boisterous children. Well it's good for those who have them I guess! But for a romantic couple break there maybe better options. We still loved our time here and would love to go back. Thank you
author: DMC

comment: Location and Service top notch . All staff are very customer focus and very helpful. Kids have lot of activities and the kids Zone staff especially Dani Sashi, Aci Resi ,Tya Dayu took excellent Care . We enjoyed the stay with the Family very much . A perfect Place with a nice private beach and Best suited for Family with Kids .
author: Siva Anand S

comment: I was there 12 nights with my Family and it was fantastic. Me my wife and my two boys have been overwhelmed by the property and by the fantastic service! All team members greeted you and we received extraordinary high class service the whole stay! Those guys are real hospitality professionals and the service comes from the heart! The General Manager seems to create a spirit in the team which motivates elevates them to high level! Great people make a great job! Recommend to book LEVEL. The Service and the faciliites are great!
author: Bastian B

comment: Exceptional Guest Service and facility. Staffs went out and beyond to provide a five star stay. I enjoyed the Pilates and Yoga classes offered every morning. You should consider Melia Nusa Dua for your next vacation or quarantine in beautiful Bali Island!
author: Winten W

comment: Stayed for 2 nights with my friends. Massive property surrounding by nature, variety of food outlets (Balinese, Spanish, Mediterranean). The spa was huge (indoor and outdoor). Staff were extremely friendly. Multi play grounds for children. And dinner by the beach.
author: Mohamad Shammout

comment: Melia Bali is a beautiful hotel with the most friendliest staff who will do anything for you. we met a young man called Merta, who worked at the swimming pool bar service. he worked his socks off in the heat, taking the time to talk to us and get to know us. He will be a great assset to Melia Bali and i wish him all the luck in the future.  p.s anybody thinking of going during rainy season to Bali
author: pcoop1984

comment: Amazing vacation! We were already in Melia for the fourth time.  We can't fault anything. We greatly appreciated the Level  service, which was excellent from the moment we arrived. Thanks to Yudi, who looked after us beautifully! Than you to the team at Level family beach: Artawiguna, Juli, Darma, Angga, and Oka. You guys are a great team! Thank you, Rika, for the service at Sorrento Restaurant. We also thank Dewa, who is already a familiar face to us from previous years. We had an excellent experience and great food from Sakura Restaurant!  We look forward to coming back to you again. Kamila and family
author: Kamila Ř

comment: I stay in this hotel in December during Christmas. I can not ask for more as this hotel is a perfect place to relax, but at the same time I can still work while having my holiday. I was impressed by the service delivered by the staff. Special thanks to Ibu Gita who helped me with my paper work and all the arrangements she did, as well as Ibu Isma. Not to forget the Front Office staff and FB staff. I will definitely be back to this hotel if I come to Bali.
author: Grace

comment: Out of our whole experience at the hotel we were extremely happy with the kids club and the service provided by Dani, Sasih, Dayu, Finda, Graney and Resi. Our son is 4 years old and had a blast during the morning activities and watching a movie while we had some adult time. A+ service at the kids club!
author: AnaGW

comment: Had the most amazing and relaxing vacation there. Travelled with my family for my husband’s birthday and had the time of our lives there. The resort itself is perfect and the people are the kindest and friendliest people I’ve ever met. I can’t wait to be back!
author: Culture09

comment: This is the best hotel ever, I think it is absolutely perfect. Its been a great experience. I would like to thank hotel management and all employees for making us fell so welcome and special. It will be forever in our hearts. I hope to return again many times.
author: Elisa Leitão

comment: Wonderful place! We have done more activities, very friendly staff particularly Ian the yoga instructor: best experience! The resort is full of restaurants for all needs. Our room was clean, large and bright. The resort offers many services.
author: Alessandro S

comment: Stayed at The Melia for 7 nights on an all exclusive deal with Luxury Escapes. What a tropical paradise! The gardens are exquisite and immaculately maintained. Our room was a great size and serviced everyday by friendly staff. Great choice of restaurants, beautiful huge pool, lots of activities and so much more.First time staying in Nusa Dua and must say what a safe and wonderful area of Bali. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff there, their service and friendliness was outstanding. Will be back!!
author: Marla Q

comment: Melia is good and is a fun experience for families and is very peaceful. Alep and Edmund were very nice staff and made our holiday. The room is very fancy and kept well cleaned.  Restaurants at Melia are great
author: Basyl

comment: We stayed at melia 18 days and everything was great, especially staff, who was better than in Hilton. Our kids love kids club. Staff made for them all Day program so parents can do what they want. Especially they loved Elsa from the staff.
author: Martin K

comment: Made Sunata is the beach joy at Melia Bali. Sincere smile, joyful care and a humble welcome. Always attentive wh a beautiful personal touch. Thank you Made for a wonderful time.  Suk su ma!  Overall Melia staff were amazing !
author: Reem T

comment: The level all inclusive package was well worth it. Great food, drinks, atmosphere and the service was amazing. Big thanks to all the staff and especially Pringga who always had a smile on his face and went out of his way to make sure we had the best stay possible.
author: Stefan V

comment: Great service, very good food  very friendly and welcoming staff. Had a wonderful stay at Melia Bali hotel. Right on Nusa Dua Beach. Very affordable rates for the very spacious room and comfortable rooms. Strongly recommend visitors to Bali to stay with the hotel.
author: Kennedy Chokuda

comment: Fantastic hotel, beautifully landscaped gardens, swings at the beach and very friendly hotel staff! The temperature in the main restaurant was always a bit too cold. It is recommended to take a sweater with you when you go for dinner. Other than that, we had a great stay!
author: Jackson N

comment: Great place to stay with family.  Nice private beach without waves.  Area itself is quit big, with lots of attractions. Super lovely service and all stuff that works in hotel is highly qualified and friendly, especially, I would like to recognize Resi!  The only drawback - prices in restaurant, except on that, everything is lovely.
author: ch1pka

comment: We chose all-inclusive here. Rooms very nice, we had a lagoon room with a pool outside the room’s terrace. Beautiful grounds, five restaurants, right on beach. Seafood restaurant was wonderful. Breakfast was buffet. Lunch a la carte. Easier to eat at the poolside or on the beach. We tried archery, there was bike hire, massage, spa etc. Great place for a romantic retreat. Safe swimming in the sea, but quite shallow a long way out. Good for kids, for whom ther3 were pool activities.
author: Horse racing fan

comment: We stay 10 day here in melia bali hotel its good hotel we have stay in ....... hotel but melia more better we like everything , all staff is very good we loved . Cuality food very good view in garden wanderfull i will be back and stay here, i want say thank u for BASMA waiter in the beach restaurant he is good waiter he is empty with us and anothr guest and he is pro activ to ,we always look him at work 😊 and we want say thanks u to with SARI the level waiteris. U are best we ll come again to see two of u . Thanks u all
author: Willious

comment: We came as a family of 16, staying in the rooms with the connecting pool.. It was great! We love our stay, the service was good, the room nice and clean and the pateo with the swimming pool is the best. We also love the private beach and the free bicycle service. I feel the breakfast was okay but maybe better if there were more variety. Will def come again!
author: Vanessa B

comment: Melia is clean, has a traditional Bali vibe. We thought breakfast was great. Great free activities, very thoughtful and friendly staff. Fabulous spot. Special thanks to Chef Bayu! Would come back again.
author: Kristy Q

comment: I have to say, all of us had the best experience ever! We were 3 generations family ( my parents are 60s, me and my husband 30s and my daughter is 6 ) and we had the best 2 weeks. The Staff is absolutely amazing, from the pool staff, the cleaning team, the chefs, the towel guys... EVERYONE. The are soo friendly, lovely and warm, I cannot say enough thank you. The breakfast caters for everyone and anyone, literally everything you could dream of; they have plenty of activities for everyone, pool volleyball, yoga, kids play, pool basketball, cooking classes ecc... the rooms are lovely and always clean. I mean what else could you want? It was a dream! It’s paradises, I would go back in a hart beat! But the staff is what make this place magical ❤️❤️
author: Sile Z

comment: I have never seen friendlier people. The staff are very helpful and the rooms are more than adequate. We had two different rooms in separate visits, the second room with a big wrap around balcony. They are well appointed and nicely air conditioned. Great service at the bar, the beach and the beach side restraurant. The breakfasts are amazing with many different cultural dishes at your disposal. It is a large resort so can be a long walk to your room but not a issue with us. A easy walk to the Bali Collection along the beach for evening dining and shopping at its best. Would stay here again.
author: Glen P

comment: Nice hotel, super clean both the area and rooms, food for breakfast so yummy..so much activities for kids, we love the carnival … the staff hotel, kids club so nice and polite and the staff from YHI spa very polite and the massage soo gewd!! Much lovee for melia nusa dua. Thank you para miss di kids club, hopefully see you again
author: Petra H

comment: Amazing stay at Melia Bali.  Right on the beach with lots of actives to keep entertained.  All inclusive package was excellent with great choice of food, cocktails and wine. All the staff were very friendly but David at El Patio was especially helpful and friendly. Highly recommend staying here.
author: Brian Q

comment: We have a great and perfect experience staying at melia hotel, they have so many activities for us. Ohh and child have their activities too.   Your child definitely will not get bored at kidsclub. They have full activities like soccer time. Swiming time. Marshmallow time. Watching movies and have their popcorn.  And the staff is very kind. Of course i know all the staff in here because they very kind. Patient and humble.   Thank you Mr & Mrs Dani, Sasih, Aci, Tya, Graney, Dewi, Maria.   Thank you for the experience melia hotel
author: Bramanta T

comment: We have just returned from our holiday at the Melia, Nusa Dua. We stayed in the garden Villa and got the Level service. Everything about our stay was incredible. The staff are so friendly, the service was outstanding; the food, drinks and attention to detail. We went to all 5 restaurants and especially loved the Tepinaki at the Japanese restaurant. The other restaurants were also fantastic. Special thanks to ADI, Sari, Resti, Darma, Aretha, and Iuova as well as Egi and Darma from Lotis restaurant, and Doni and the lovely young lady who greeted us on arrival. Would definitely recommend this place booked through Luxury Escapes and would love to come back. Thank you so much 🙏 Leanne & Ben Ward
author: Leanne W

comment: We stayed at Melia for 5 nights on the all inclusive package, absolutely worth it. Everyone there was so amazing. Kids club is especially amazing - thank you to Sasih, Finda, Dani you were fantastic with our girls and so accommodating with the babysitting. We will be back and recommending to everyone 😊
author: AlexaKym

comment: Have a magnifique experience when I and my family stayed in Melia. Really feel like coming home when came back to Melia. All the facilities and activities they offer, just stay at the hotel and don't need to go anywhere is more than enough. Thank you forIbu Dayu and Tia, they are really helpful.  Love to come back as soon as possible. Great job for Melia Team.
author: Abhi

comment: Would definitely come back to Melia. Service is outstanding,  staff are friendly.  Food is absolutely top quality, each restaurant is better than the next. Our favourites was Japanese  and Sorrento. Coffee in Kopi Petani is great just like home. See you again Meli Bali.
author: Karren K

comment: What a great experience we had with our family. Everything was perfect but especially the Level-service! Many special thanks to our friends of the level pool and beach. We want to thank Pringga, Arta, Darma, Oka and Juli for making this an unforgettable stay at the Melia! Maybe we see each other again in the near future! Good luck to all of you!
author: Simon V

comment: Good place to stay with kids, and they have a good facilities, and fun activity like yoga, feeding fish,  the have upgrade the facilities at kids club ,,special thanks for all the staf at melia for being so freindly to us . big thank to miss at kids club Dani,sasih,aci, tya, resi, graney, dayu and staf at play carnival ian soma alep  I will see you very soon . We love melia bali and the beach so much
author: Putri Ayu

comment: Wonderful stay at Level Melia. Despite one of the oldest hotel in Nusa Dua. Still very impressed by level of services and attention delivered to guest. A nice touch at Sorrento for breakfast with exclusive menu and a la carte choice. A must try.
author: Indotraveler49

comment: Good lobby design, clean and friendly staff. Service can be a little slow sometimes, but staff is very friendly. Would recommend especially to families with kids. However, we also enjoyed staying there without kids. Thank you.
author: kristinavpark

comment: Love this hotel especially the room! Got pool access and free froyo in lagoon bar all day. Its super clean and the staff are super attentive and friendly. The place is very relaxing and fun. Its perfect for a getaway with your friends, family, or your date!
author: Catherine C

comment: An old establishment but well-maintained. Fantastic staff, great activities mostly free for guests. Perfect for families, plenty to do around the resort. Cycling, yoga, kids’ club etc. You’ll not run out of things to do! We stayed in the family suite which was a duplex set up. Overall, enjoyable stay at Melia, will be back hopefully very soon!
author: Rosseline T

comment: The resort was fantastic , plenty of bars and restaurants  and a beautiful private beach. One member of staff stood out to us his name is Wayan Juliawan his service was exceptional. He was so friendly,  so helpful and really professional. We would definitely stay again 😁
author: Navigator782464

comment: We had a stay for three nights in Melia Nusa Dua,Bali. Welcome drink is served upon checked in . Toilets are clean but not the newest design. The room is clean.The hotel got a very nice view.Hotel has many facilities for kids. It was a perfect staycation
author: Cecilia P

comment: We recently stayed at Melia Bali. Loved every aspect of our stay. Special mention to the Pool Concierge, especially the service of Oka Arimbawa. He was so proactive and helpful. He could almost predict what we needed. Would definitely stay again.
author: Jodie Q

comment: Spent 2 night in Melia Bali with family. This hotel applying superb Cov19 protocol. We have our room upgraded into Junior Suite with Pool Access and have a late checkout. Friendly staff in every corner of the hotel. Food is delicious as usual. With beach upfront - and very clean - you can have your good time in beach. Will always come back to this hotel every time going to Bali.
author: Andy Yonatan

comment: We were lucky enough to stay in Melia and we were extremely pleased. We stayed in one of the lugana rooms. The room was perfect. Amazing superking bed, laguna pool on your doorstep, the shower was incredible. The breakfast buffet was lovely and the staff were so friendly and helpful. Our only downside was that due to covid some of the restaurants were closed but its completely understandable. Wouldn't hesitate to come back.
author: James B

comment: Absolutely awesome resort, rooms are amazing , clean , fresh and cool , staff are so lovely every single one of them .  Restaurants are perfect , wonderful selection of food across all of them .  Pools are sparkling clean . The all inclusive deal is definitely the way to go .
author: Bronwyn D

comment: We travelled with family for 6 nights at Melia. Everything was perfect. Staff were most friendly and the choice of food and drinks were exceptional. Rooms were beautiful and serviced daily. Best holiday ever.   We will definitely be back.
author: Gayle D

comment: Cozy hotel with superb services. Very clean with hospitable and kind stuff. Located in Bali Indonesia in the Indian Ocean, Melia Bali has a magnificent view of the ocean   I would visit again in future.
author: ugandasafaris p

comment: Melia Bali is the perfect destination for a special holiday. The staff as always are amazing , the location in Nusa Dua is lovely  The hotel and gardens are like an oasis in paradise. Highly recommended
author: Gus G

comment: The hotel area is very big. There are many activity for the whole family. We tried the bicycle ride with our toddler and that was fun. We also join marshmallow and movie time in the evening. But above all, our kid really love the kids club. The place is very clean and the staff are very caring to each kid. Thanks to Sasih, Dayu, Doni, Tia, Resi, Aci and all the other staffs.
author: Ellen N

comment: Overall great service! Pak Alep helps me a lot during archery session, kayak,  and cycling. food are delicious and all of the staff were friendly and very very helpful. I would probably come back again! thank you so much!!
author: Nur Malika Maghfirah

comment: Melia Bali is such a beautiful place to stay. I had a great time, The scenery is blissful and unforgettable. There is nothing I didn’t like there. Thanking Juliawan for great service. Staff make you feel very welcome.
author: Jacob B

comment: Hi, we just ended our tour in Bali Indonesia. I would like to thank the staff of Kids Club in Melia, Bali to leave special sweet memories for my children. Dewi, Elsa, Dani, Sasih, Maria, Greni, Resi and Tya, they all are so nice. Hope to come to Bali again.
author: Gul A

comment: Amazing service. Especially the beach bar staff and Witana at the front desk.  The price was so affordable and the weather was great!  You have to go there.  It’s time to start reigniting the beauty of this amazing country and these amazing people again.
author: Jamie J

comment: We have a great experience about this hotel, clean and comfort room with warm lagoon pool, also helpful and friendly staff. They also help us to bring the breakfast to the room. Marsmallow party in the evening was one of best part.
author: Sigit Mul

comment: The best hotel in Bali! Friendly staff, good food, big hotel. Private beach access. There’s a lot of activities for kids and adults. Lagoon access Junior Suite was the best room. Big and clean room, you can swim straight from your room. Will back here again.
author: Fanny

comment: Excellent staff and cuisine and drinks, the tours and visits are well managed and the water sports and pool activities are excellent. the water volleyball, basketball and water polo was another level. Gede especially was very fun and inclusive.
author: Ryan G

comment: After looking at the reviews for Melia, I decided this was where my family and I would stay. I found this place to be extremely luxurious but also kid-friendly. They had a great park for kids and tables and chairs for kids to draw. The food here was great and the atmosphere was very relaxing. I went home home happy.
author: RandyFuller844

comment: We had an amazing experience here at Melia Bali. We booked into the 'LEVEL' which is an all inclusive package that they offer. We well looked after. The staff are top notch.  Restaurants and bars were great. A lot of variety to choose from. We will definitely be back!!
author: Hylton B

comment: Melia Bali was a very luxurious resort, with wonderful restaurants and facilities.  It suited our family with plenty of kids activities. The Kids club was one of the best I’ve seen as run by the wonderful ladies Dani, Sasih, Finda, Dayu, Graney and Resi. All the staff were excellent with the children.  I would definitely stay here again.
author: Kristy

comment: We had a lovey stay at Melia Bali. Stunning rooms and resort. We opted in for the extra package, “the level”.  We had a private pool and were well looked after by the staff. Pringga was very welcoming, friendly and always smiling!
author: Billy B

comment: We spent 5 days 4 nights in Melia Nusa Dua. We love the room, the lagoon and the location. Their private beach is one of the best. The food is also good though the menu is quite short, not so.many choices. The health protocol is implemented very well.
author: neeabintang

comment: Sofitel is definitely one of the best hotels in Nusa Dua. Food is great and rooms are lovely. I travelled for business and Pak Bagus our butler was exceptional. He was on top of everything and went above & beyond to help us. Thank you Bagus!
author: Abczyxcde
